He is very determined and proactive in his work, although his limited financial resources have kept him back from more fully developing professionally. To this end, Kamel was interested in petitioning a loan from Al Majmoua to purchase materials for his business and to service the remaining payments on his home, which would then allow him to subsequently marry and start a family.

loans.use: priceto purchase construction materials for his business and to  pay what's left from his kids bed room

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This Kiva borrower is a 31-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and one sibling.  He has been working as a mechanic for the past 14 years. In 2007, he opened his own car repair shop. He is specialized in repairing all types of cars. He has taken advantage of a first Kiva loan and has been a reliable client who repaid on his scheduled dates.

Today, he is requesting to borrow $2000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase machinery and new tools in order to reinforce his business operation and further develop his work. He is looking to diversify his business and open a new shop where he will buy and sell car spare parts. His income is needed to help support his wife and only child.

loans.use: to purchase machinery and new tools.

loans.name: Amadou Group

texts.fr: A. est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont la présidente (dont la main est levée sur la photo) est nommée Abiba. Les membres du groupe viennent du même village. Abiba est mariée à Issifou et a trois enfants, tous scolarisés. Il y a juste un an que Abiba et son mari se sont installés à Ekpè, dans la commune de Sèmè-Podji. Ils y vivent avec leurs enfants. Abiba vient en aide à son mari en assurant avec lui les diverses charges familiales. Pour y parvenir, Abiba prépare de « Kome » (aliment local fait à base de maïs) accompagné de sauce aux poissons, qu’elle vend de façon ambulante. Abiba fait ses provisions dans le marché de Abattoir à Cotonou et aussi à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. Abiba exerce cette activité depuis sept ans. C’est une ancienne cliente de ALIDé, qui a bien remboursé les crédits antérieurs qu’elle avait reçus. En vue de renforcer son capital et d’augmenter sa production journalière afin de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle, Abiba sollicite un autre financement de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres de son groupe.
texts.en: A. is a group made up of three people, whose president (raising her hand in the photograph) is called Abiba. The members of the group come from the same village. Abiba is married to Issifou and has three children, all of whom attend school. Abiba and her husband moved to Ekpè, in the Sèmè-Podji municipality only a year ago, where they now live with their children. Abiba helps her husband by seeing to the various needs of the family.  To help out, Abiba produces 'Kome' (a local corn-based dish) with fish sauce, which she sells through door-to-door sales. Abiba sources her goods from the Abattoir market in Cotonou, and also from Dantokpa, Benin's international market.  She has worked in this field for seven years, and has already received and repaid several loans from ALIDé. In order to boost her business capital and her daily output so that she can meet her customers' growing demand, she and the other group members are seeking a new loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: To purchase corn, fish and condiments

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a big shop and organize a good general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a new car.

loans.name: Shota

texts.en:
Shota lives in Zestaponi, West Georgia. He is 52 years old and lives with wife Nana, their 19-year-old daughter and their 15-year-old son. Shota’s daughter is a student at a high school and his son goes to school. 

Shota works in a local construction company. Besides his regular job he is involved in the family dairy farm activities. They have two milk cows. Nana produces cheese and sells it on local market. The total average monthly income of the family is 800 Laris. 

A small part of the requested credit (18%) will be used to cover Shota’s old loan. With the rest of the credit (82%), Shota and Nana will purchase an additional milk cow and feed for it. Nana will produce more cheese and sell it on the local market. Taking into account the existing demand for cheese on the market, she won’t have a problem selling more cheese. 

The increase in the family’s income will be used for financing the children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow and feed.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This Kiva borrower is a 34-year-old married man and the father of four children. He has made his living as an experienced taxi driver. He has been involved in this business since 1999. He serves all customers and he also does private transportation such as picnics, touristic tours, etc. He is the sole income provider for the family. 

Today, he is requesting to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a new car in order to expand his business. He says that the new car will help him increase his profits which will allow him to better support his family.

loans.use: to purchase a new car.

loans.name: George

texts.ar: جورج متزوج عمره 62 سنة يعمل في تعهدات البلاط للمنلز والمكاتب والورش له في عمله 20 سنة يحب هذا العمل ويرى انه بحاجة الى دعمه بشكل اكبر فهو يسعى الى تأمين حياة كريمة تضمن له العيش بشكل جيد يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء عدة للمصلحة منشار وعدة يعاني من منافسة قوية ورأس مال ضعيف هذا ما يعيق تطور العمل يطمح بأن يصبح صاحب مؤسسة كبيرة تقوم على بيع المعدات بالمفرق والجملة حتى يؤمن مستقبل جيد لأولاده
texts.en: George is 62 years old and married. He has worked for twenty years providing ceramics for homes, offices, and workshops. He derives great satisfaction from his work, although he struggles against fierce competition and a lack of capitA.. To this end, he wanted to seek a loan from A. Majmoua to purchase a saw and other equipment for his business. Ultimately, George hopes to one day be the proud owner of a large establishment selling appliances both retail and wholesale so that he can secure a good future for his children.

loans.use: to purchase a saw and other equipment for his ceramics business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This Kiva borrower is a 20-year-old Lebanese single woman living with one parent and one sibling. Despite her young age, she has been working for several years as a hairdresser. Her business is based at her house and she also serves customers at their domiciles.  In parallel, she has worked in a beauty salon since 2007. Her work is very important because she helps her family in paying the high cost of living. 

Today, she is requesting to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new hairdressing tools and supplies. In the future, she is planning to open a formal beauty salon in order to expand her business level.

loans.use: to purchase new hairdressing materials and supplies.

loans.name: Teona

texts.en:
Teona comes from the village of Merjevi, Sachkhere District. She is 25 years old and lives with her husband Zviad, their one-year-old son and Grandma. The main income of the family comes from agricultural activities, which are led by Teona and Zviad. They have a small dairy farm – two cows, whose milk is used for cheese production. The cheese is sold on the local market. Also, they have 1.5 ha of agricultural land, where different types of vegetables are grown. Also, Zviad has a vineyard and sells grapes and wine. 

Along with the above-mentioned, Teona earns money by selling vegetables. She sells the vegetables on the local open market. 

With the requested credit, Teona plans to purchase an additional milk cow and three sheep. She will be able to sell more cheese and increase the income of the family. For the future Teona and Zviad plan to expand their sheep-breeding activities and expand their herd of sheep. 

The increase in income will allow Teona to purchase new household goods, especially for his little son.

loans.use: to pay for a milk cow and sheep.

loans.name: Peter Kahara

texts.en:
Peter has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 10 years.  He is 41 years old, married to Hannah Wanjiku and they have four children.  

He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be his second loan.  He paid his previous loan well and in good time.  He plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In future, Peter hopes to become a leading farmer in Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase modern tools and other equipment

loans.name: John Mungai

texts.en:
John has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 10 years.  He is 29 years old, married to Lucy Wanjiru and they have 3 children.  

He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be his 1st loan. He plans to use the loan amount to buy fertilizer, seeds and pay for labor.

In future, John hopes to become a leading farmer in Ndunyu Njeru area

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and pay for labor

loans.name: Fatima

texts.ar: فاطمه في عمر 39 سنة متزوجة وام لولدان تعمل فاطمة منذ 5 سنوات في بيع الالبسة والاحذية متجولة تحب عملها واولادها اولى اهتمامها تريد من خلال المجموعة الى دعم عملها وتطوير وتحقيق ما تطمح اليه في فتح محل خاص لها وخاصة بعد اذ انها تعرضة لحادث ما اضطرها الى اجراء عملية جراحية في قدمها التي هي وسيلة الوحيدة التي تعمل من خلالها اذ ان عملها متجول تريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء بضاعة البسة واحذية موسمية ودفع تكاليف اجراء عملية جراحية لقدمها قبل موسم الصيف حتى تتمكن من المعافات لتستطيع تكملة عملها فهي امراة تعتمد على نفسها في التقدم وبناء المستقبل وتربية الاولاد وهي طموحة وحنونة وتتلقى الدعم من عائلتها حتى تستكمل المسيرة في العمل
texts.en: Fatima 39 years old and married with two children. She has been working for the past five years and is an itinerant shoes and clothing saleswoman. Given that an accident has forced her to undergo a costly operation on her foot (a rather vital appendage in her line of work), she was hoping to obtain a loan from Al Majmoua to pay off her hospital bills and also to purchase new inventory for the summer season. Fatima is a very self-reliant and simpatico woman who is driven to give her children a proper upbringing and hopes to one day own her own store.

loans.use: to purchase summer clothes and shoes to sell and to pay off her hospital bills.

loans.name: Benson

texts.en:
Benson has operated in the transport industry in Naivasha town for the last two years. He is 39 years old, married to Mirriam and they have three children. 

He was introduced to KADET  LTD by his friend and this will be his 2nd loan. He paid for his previous loan of kshs 63,000  well and in good time. He plans to use the loan amount to buy a new motorcycle. He will employ someone else to operate it thus increasing income and creating employment.

In the future, Benson hopes to buy a pickup truck which he will be using to transport goods to and from the market.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike

loans.name: Cornelius Moturi

texts.en:
Cornelius has practiced farming in Naivasha town for the last four years. He is 35 years old, married to Christine Nyamboke and has five children.  

He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be his fourth loan. He paid all his previous loans on time. He plans to use this loan amount to buy seed and fertilizer.

In the future, Cornelius hopes to become a leading farmer in the Naivasha area.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer

loans.name: John Njenga

texts.en:
John has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last five years. He is 39 years old and married to Alice Wambui. Together they have three children.  

He was introduced to KADET LTD by a friend and this will be his second loan. He repaid his previous loan on time. He plans to use this loan to buy fertilizer and seed and pay for labor.

In future, John hopes to become a leading dairy farmer in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed and pay for labor

loans.name: Maritha Wairimu

texts.en:
Maritha has practiced farming in the town of Ndunyu Njeru for the last five years. She is 67 years old, married to Joseph Mensa and they have three children together.  

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a friend and this will be her second loan. She repaid her previous loan on time. She plans to use the loan amount to buy seed and fertilizer and pay for labor.

In the future, Maritha hopes to become a leading farmer in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer and pay for labor

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr: Célibataire à 27ans, Koffi  tient une blanchisserie de lavage à sec depuis 2010. Pour les besoins de sa boutique, il s’approvisionne à Lomé. Ce prêt lui servira à réaménager sa blanchisserie et acheter certains produits pour améliorer son travail. C’est un jeune homme sérieux  qui cherche à s’établir financièrement avant de s’engager dans la vie maritale.
texts.en: Koffi is a single 27 year-old who has been running a dry-cleaning business since 2010. He sources his goods from Lomé. He is seeking a loan in order to re-fit his business and to purchase dry-cleaning products. He is a sensible young man who is seeking financial stability before settling down to married life.

loans.use: to purchase items to re-fit his business, and dry-cleaning products

loans.name: Gicheha

texts.en:
Gicheha has practiced farming in the town of Ndunyu Njeru for the past 30 years. He is 52 years old, married to Margaret and they have five children.  

He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be his first loan. He plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for labour during this planting season.  

In the future, Gicheha hopes to become a leading farmer in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer and to pay for labor

loans.name: Hope

texts.en:
Retailing is 26-year-old N. Hope's business, one in which she has been giving a good account of herself for seven years now in Nabuti-Mukono. She says to get established in this enterprise, she was prevailed upon by her close friends who were already engaged in business. The single mother of one sells a variety of general merchandise that is in high demand amongst the people around her neighborhood.

Hard work and determination have been her calling cards, and weekly she earns profits of shillings 400,000. She will use this loan to purchase more retail commodities to resell.

loans.use: to purchase more retail commodities to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase staple foods (corn and rice)

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.ar:
محمد في عمر 32 سنة متزوج وهو اب لأربع اولاد يعمل في بيع اللحوم والخواريف له في عمله 15 سنة يحب عمله ويسعى الى دعمه وتطويره يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء خواريف لتسمين الخواريف الاخرى ودعم عمله بالملحمة زبائنه هم من جيرانه واقاربه واصدقائه يعاني من بعض الصعوبات المادية وله خبرة طويلة في عمله يحلم بامتلاك ملحمة خاصة اكبر حتى يزيد من مدخوله
يريد ان يؤمن مستقبل جيد لأولاده وتعليمهم بأفضل الطرق
texts.en: Mohamad is 32 years old and married with four children. He has fifteen years of experience selling mutton and other types of meet to his relatives, neighbors, and friends. He dreams of one day owning his own, larger butchery so that he can secure a better income and therefore provide his children with a better education. In the meantime, he was interested in applying for a loan from Al Majmoua to purchase more sheep and to procure fodder to fatten up the sheep he already has.

loans.use: to purchase fodder and sheep for his butchery.

loans.name: Richard Kanyagia

texts.en:
Richard, 34 and married to Jane Wangui, has practised farming in the town of Olkalou for the last three years. He was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers, and this will be his second loan, having paid his previous one well and in good time. He plans to use the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In the future, Richard hopes to become a leading farmer in the Olkalou area.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings and to plough the land.

loans.name: Siranush

texts.en:
Siranush, who lives in the city of Vanadzor with her retired mother, received higher education in the field of economics. For many years, she  has been running a trading business selling imported clothes and crockery from Yerevan in her shop in Vanadzor.  Siranush’s niece helps her in the business, so some of the business income goes to Siranush's brother's family. 

Siranush is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 AMD from Kiva lenders to import an assortment of summer clothes for her business. This will be her 22nd loan from Nor Horizon and her second loan through Kiva.

loans.use: To import an assortment of summer clothes for her business.

loans.name: Mika

texts.en:
Mika, 32, is a married father of three children aged 13, 9, and 4 years. His spouse, Lucy, helps to support their family with additional income. Mika's primary business is vehicle repairs, but he also sells groundnuts. With this loan he intends to purchase tools for repair work and groundnuts to sell. He has been in this business for one year, and this will be his first loan from KADET LTD.

Mika will use the anticipated profits to improve his family's lifestyle and hopes to have his own workshop in the future.

loans.use: to purchase tools and 4 kgs of groundnuts.

loans.name: Paul Kiarii

texts.en: Paul has been farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the past 11 years.  He is 35 years old, married, and has three children.  He was introduced to KADET LTD by a friend and this will be his fifth loan.  He repaid all his previous loans in a timely manner.  He plans to use this loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. In the future, Paul hopes to become a leading farmer in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Jonah

texts.en:
Jonah has practiced farming in Olkalou town for the last 11 years. He is 36 years old and married to Jane. They have two children.  

He was introduced to KADET  Ltd. by one of our field officers and this will be his first loan. He plans to use the loan to buy fertilizer and plough the land before planting.

In the future, Jonah hopes to become a leading farmer in the Olkalou area.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and prepare the land for planting.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane has operated her retail shop in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 10 years. She is 30 years old and married to Patrick. They have two children.

She was introduced to KADET Ltd. by one of our field officers and this will be her third loan. She repaid all her previous loans well and in good time. She plans to use the loan amount to buy more goods like flour, sugar, sweets and soft dinks for resale in her retail shop.

In the future, Jane hopes to grow her retail shop to wholesale.

loans.use: To buy retail goods for resale.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James has practiced farming in Olkalou town for the last 21 years. He is 41 years old and married to Margaret. They have two children.  

He was introduced to KADET Ltd. by one of our field officers and this will be his second loan. He repaid his previous loan well and in good time.  He plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer.

In the future, James hopes to become a leading farmer in the Olkalou area.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Fayrouz

texts.ar: فيروز امرأة ارملة وهي ام لولد تعمل في بيع المواد الغذائية محل سمانه لها في عملها 6 سنوات تحب العمل تتميز بعملها بالصدق والجدية في العمل تبيع جميع انواع المواد الغذائية تريد ان تزيد من مدخولها وان تدعم عائلتها تريد ان تساعد ابنها التعلم وتخطي مصاعب الحياة وخاصة انها هي من تعيله وتقوم بتكفل بمصاريفه هي ام حنونة وامراة عاملة ذات دخل محدود ولكنها تسعى الى ان تزيد من مدخولها ودعم محلها حتى تصبح ذات دخل اكبر تريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء بضاعة للمحل وتقوية العمل حتى تزيد من مدخول عائلتها
texts.en: Fayrouz is a widow and the loving mother of a young child. For the past six years she has been working with great diligence in a small shop selling various types of foodstuffs to help support her son and her extended family. Fayrouz was interested in asking for a loan from Al Majmoua to purchase more inventory for her store.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs for her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her store’s clothing inventory.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph has practiced farming in Olkalou town for the last 14 years. He is 51 years old and married to Monicah. They have four children who are all school going.  

He was introduced to KADET Ltd. by one of our field officers and this will be his third loan. He repaid his previous loans well and in good time. He plans to use the loan to buy seeds, a dairy cow and fertilizer.

In the future, Joseph hopes to become a leading dairy farmer in the Olkalou area.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and a dairy cow.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred has practiced farming in Olkalou town for the last nine years. He is 39 years old and married to Racheal. They have three children.  

He was introduced to KADET  Ltd. by one of our field officers and this will be his second loan. He repaid his previous loan well and in good time.  He plans to use the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farming activities.

In the future, Fred hopes to become a leading farmer in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Tusitukirewamu Women's Group

texts.en: 54-year-old Rehemah has been engaged in a fish sales business for the past 10 years in Kayunga District. The happy-go-lucky happily married mother of eight says that she decided to enter this business upon determining the high demand for fish in her home area. Rehemah also ekes out side profits from a modest goat-selling business. Rehemah says she makes 25,000 shillings per day in her business. With this loan, she will purchase better fishing nets and more fish to resell.

loans.use: to purchase better fishing nets and more fish to resell.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.ar: محمد عمره 24 سنة اعزب يعمل في بيع وتشريج خطوط الهواتف النقالة له في عمله سنة يحب عمله ويريد ان يطوره وان يزيد من مدخول عمله له خبرة في هذا العمل يتميز عمله بالدقة والعمل الجيد ما يعيق تطوره هو نقص في الدخل يريد زيادة رأس المال من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة يسعى تقوية عمله من خلال شراء كومبيوترات وفتح محل تسلية عبر الانترنت يطمح بتوسيع عمله وزيادة مدخوله خاصة انه في ريعان شبابه وفي طور تأسيس عائلة
texts.en: Mohamad is 24 years old and single. He has been working for the past year in a shop selling mobile phones and phone chargers. He very much enjoys his work, which he practices with considerable thoroughness; the only thing he lacks is more capital. Accordingly, he wanted to ask for a loan from Al Majmoua to purchase several computers and remodel his store to also be an internet café. Mohamad is very driven by the vigor of youth and the desire to start a family soon.

loans.use: to purchase computers and remodel his store into an internet cafe.

loans.name: John Mbugua

texts.en:
John, who has practiced farming in the town of Olkalou for the last five years, is 30 years old, married to Lucy Wairimu and the father of three children. John was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers, and this will be his third loan, his previous loans all repaid well and in good time. He plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer and to plough the land.

In the future, John hopes to become a leading dairy farmer in the Olkalou area.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds and to plough the land.

loans.name: Eunice Wanjiru

texts.en:
Eunice has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 9 years. She is 50 years old, married to Peter Nganga and they have three children.  

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her third loan. She paid all her previous loans well and in good time. She plans to use the loan amount to pay school fees for her daughters.

In the future, Eunice hopes to become a leading farmer in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loans.use: to pay her daughters' school fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Las Nubecitas Group

texts.es:
La señora Bellarmina G. Gutiérrez, es casada con el señor  Audon Santos G. con quien procreo  dos hijas María de los Ángeles de siete años y Maira Jazmín de tan solo cuatro años quienes están en primaria y preescolar.

     Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de marranos y solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de alimentos, como son. Maíz, alimento, para que así  se críen como sus clientes  desean comprar, pues no los quieren flacos porque dice que no se vende si no están en buen calidad.

     Su actividad lo inicio hace dos años  onece meses  y es para apoyarse con los ingresos de su hogar aun que cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo ella también quiere aportar para así sacar adelante  a su peque familia.

     Ella  desea que con el préstamo y esta pequeña actividad pueda lograr incrementar mas su negocio  para que así logren sacar adelante a su tres hijas  si tres porque en unos días nace otra pequeña.

    Las personas que integran en el grupo son: Urema G. Gutiérrez, quien tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes y la señora Teresa  Gutiérrez Sánchez también en su pequeña tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Bellarmina G. Gutiérrez is married to Audon Santos G., and they have two daughters: María de los Ángeles, who is 7 and is in elementary school, and Maira Jazmín, who is only 4 years old and is in pre-school.

Bellarmina has a business raising and selling pigs.  She requests a loan to invest in the purchase of pig feed and corn so that they will grow into animals that her customers want to buy, as they don't like the skinny ones.  She says that the pigs don't sell if they are not good quality.

She started this business 11 years ago to help pay the household expenses.  Even though she has the support of her husband, she also wants to contribute to help her small family to get ahead.

With this loan, Bellarmina wants to expand her small business so that she can support her three children.  She says three, because very soon she will give birth to her third baby.

The members of this group are: Urema G. Gutiérrez, who has small grocery store, and Teresa  Gutiérrez Sánchez, who also has a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise and later sell, and also to buy feed and corn for them

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe es originaria de Ocampo un lugar lleno de naturaleza ya que ahí se encuentran los santuarios de la mariposa monarca que es un atractivo turístico en los meses de noviembre a febrero, ella cuenta con 25 años de edad y esta casada con el señor Eliseo el cual tiene un local donde arregla y da mantenimiento a motosierras, ellos tienen un niño de nombre Franco el cual tiene 5 años de edad. Doña Guadalupe esta pidiendo un préstamo para la compra de colchas, sabanas, cortinas, toallas, batas de baño, manteles etc. Ella tiene con este negocio aproximadamente 5 años y comenta que vende sus colchas con sus conocidas y vecinas y que empezó con este negocio para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Guadalupe esta agradecida por el préstamo que le están otorgando ya que así podrá tener colchas en existencia, ella dice “si tengo productos en existencia como que las clientas se animan a comprarme las colchas por eso estoy pidiendo el crédito ya que de la vista nace el amor por las cosas y ríe”. La meta que tiene la señora es poder tener un local estable para asi estar mas al pendiente de su hijo.
texts.en: Guadalupe is originally from Ocampo, a place full of nature including a monarch sanctuary which functions as a tourist attraction from November to February. She is 25 years old and married to Mr. Eliseo who has a mechanic shop where he repairs power saws. They have a 5 year old son named Franco. Mrs. Guadalupe is requesting a loan to buy bed spreads, sheets, curtains, towels, bath robes, table clothes, etc. She has been in this business for approximately 5 years and says she sells her linens to neighbors and people she knows. She says she also started this business to help her husband pay their house bills. Guadalupe is thankful for the loan being offered with which she will have linens available to sell. She says, "if I have products available then clients will be more likely to buy them since love for things develops from sight." Her goal is to have her own shop so she can take better care of her son.

loans.use: to buy bed spreads, sheets, curtains, towels, bath robes, table clothes, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more general merchandise and retail commodities for resale.

loans.name: Flor De Luz

texts.es:
La señora Flor de luz Pérez  Pérez, es originaria de Coapilla Estado de Chiapas México ella es casada con el señor Gilberto Zenteno Gutiérrez y con quien procreo dos hijas Adi Dilema  Farelo Gutiérrez veinti un años de edad y María Elide de doce años en primero de secundaria.
 
    Ella se dedica a su pequeña  estética, en donde lleva   veinti dos años practicándola y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello y la ayuda de su esposo a logrado estar trabajando para sacar adelante a sus hijas.

    Comenta que ella desde muy joven le gustaba cortar cabello y su mama la mando cursos en la ciudad de Tuxtla, para que se prepare,  así  con el tiempo tener su estérica y pueda trabajar con eso, y comenta que gracias adiós es como su mama lo deseo hoy trabaja como da mente.
 
   Su más grande deseo es que siga trabajando para que logre tiene ahorros y con ello poder apoyar a sus hijas que están estudiando.
texts.en:
Mrs. Flor de luz Pérez Pérez is from Coapilla, Chiapas State, México. She is married to Mr. Gilberto Zenteno Gutiérrez and together they have 2 daughters Adi Dilema Farelo Gutiérrez who is 21 years old, and María Elide who is 12 years old in her first year of junior high school.

She has been working in a small hair salon for 22 years and comments that she is doing very well since with this business and he husband's help she has been able to help her daughters succeed in life.

She tells us that she liked cutting hair from a very young age and her mother sent her to the city of Tuxtla to better prepare herself so that in the future she would have her hair salon to work in. She says that thanks to God she works comfortably as her mother wanted.

Her biggest wish is to continue working to save up and support her daughters' education.

loans.use: to buy hair dye, hair treatments, bleach, and other hair salon products.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La señora  Marina Estrada Pérez, vive en Coapilla Estado de Chiapas México, casada y tuvo siete hijos  quienes ya están casados.

    El préstamo que ella solicito es para invertirlo el préstamo en la  compra de ingrediente como son: harina, aceite, queso, huevo, entre otros para la elaboración de panes donde lleva treinta y un años  y comenta que le va bien ya que con ellos saca adelante   a sus hijos.

   Quien   la inspiro en esta actividad fue su cuñada quienes también se dedica va  a lo  mismo y con la ayuda de su esposo  quien trabaja en el campo lo platicaron para que así tengan ingresos de ambos.
 
    Su más grande deseo es que con esta actividad y el préstamo siga trabajando para así  tener ahorros y más adelante pueda apoyarse.
texts.en: Marina lives in Coapilla, in the state of Chiapas, México.  She is married and has seven adult children.  Marina will use this credit to buy baking ingredients such as: flour, oil, cheese, eggs, and other items.  She has been baking bread for sale for over 30 years, and this is how she supported her children.  Marina was inspired in her business by her sister-in-law, who also runs a bakery, and by her husband, who works in agriculture to provide for the household.  Her greatest wish is to see this credit result in increased profits, savings and a better future.

loans.use: to buy stock of ingredients for baking bread

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past 3 years, she has operated a firewood selling business. She sells as retailer to her local neighbours. In addition, she also sells green groceries with which she earns her other source of income. Salma faces a major challenge of theft because of insecurity in her area of operation. She dreams of establishing a retail shop in the future.

With the 60,000 KES, she would like to purchase bundles of firewood for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of firewood for resale.

loans.name: Bendard

texts.en: Bendard is 38 years old and married with four children. He repairs worn out shoes to earn a living. He also farms to earn extra income. Bendard had almost given up on his business, but when he joined Faulu Kenya, he became hopeful because he could access a business loan. He has used his previous loans from Faulu Kenya to boost his business. He has requested 80,000 KES to buy tools to repair shoes.

loans.use: To buy tools to repair shoes.

loans.name: Ilia

texts.en:
Ilia is a 49-year-old farmer from the village of Ghaniri. He is married and lives with his wife Maya and two sons (19 and 12 years old). His older son serves in the Georgian Army and the younger son goes to school. 

The only source of income for the family is agriculture. In particular, they have three milk cows. The milk is used for cheese production. Approximately 80 kg of traditional Georgian cheese is sold per month. Also, they own 2 ha of land, where maize is grown; four tons of maize is harvested annually, 0.5 tons of which is sold on the market. The rest of the corn is used in the family. Along with the above-mentioned, Ilia and Maya grow strawberries on a plot with an area of 400 sq. meters. Approximately 300 kg of strawberries are sold during the season. 

500 Laris from the requested credit will be used for tilling and fertilizing the land. After the above-mentioned processes, Ilia and Maya will get more and better quality harvest and sell it for a higher price. That will positively impact the income of the family. With the remaining 700 Laris Ilia and Maya will purchase a new refrigerator for their house. 

The received profit will be used for expansion of the dairy farm. Ilia plans to purchase additional cows.

loans.use: to purchase fuel for tractor, fertilizers and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia is 53 years old, married, and has three children.  She sells rice and tea leaves to earn a living.  She saves part of her business profits with a group in Faulu Kenya.  Through the group, she is able to get a loan because the members guarantee each other's loans.  She used her previous loan from Faulu Kenya to boost her business.  She is requesting a loan of 50,000 KES, which she will use to buy rice.

loans.use: To purchase rice

loans.name: Wangninagbe Group

texts.fr: Le groupe WANGNINAGBE est composé de trois personnes qui vendent toutes dans le même marché de Tokplégbé dans la commune de Sèmè-Podji. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Honorine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Honorine est née en 1982 à Cotonou et a un enfant qui est scolarisé. Honorine vit seule avec son enfant à Agblangandan, dans la commune de Sèmè-Podji. Honorine s’est installée dans ce quartier depuis onze ans. Honorine ne vit plus avec son mari. Honorine n’est pas allée à l’école, mais a appris la coiffure, activité qu’elle mène depuis quatre ans environs et qui lui apporte des revenus l’aidant à faire face aux besoins de son enfant. Parallèlement à cette activité, Honorine vend divers produits (biscuits, bombons, etc.) au marché Tokplégbé. Honorine s’approvisionne à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Honorine sollicite à nouveau un crédit, ensemble avec les autres membres de son groupe.
texts.en: The ANGNINAGBE group is made up of three people who all sell goods at the Tokplégbé market, in the Sèmè-Podji municipality. It is the second time that this group is seeking a loan from ALIDé, in order to boost their business. The group's representative, Honorine, has her hand raised in the photograph. She was born in 1982 in Cotonou and has one child who attends school. Honorine lives alone with her child in Agblangandan, in the  Sèmè-Podji municipality, where she moved 11 years ago. She no longer lives with her husband. She did not attend school, but learned hairdressing four years ago in order to make money to see to her family's needs. In addition to this she sells various food products (biscuits, sweets, etc.) at the Tokplégbé market. Honorine sources her goods from Dantokpa, Benin's international market. In order to see to her customers' needs and to boost her revenue, she and the other group members are seeking a new loan.

loans.use: To purchase hairdressing products and food items (sweets, biscuits etc)

loans.name: Blanca Graciela

texts.es:
Blanca de 30 años de edad, es soltera, tiene casa propia que cuenta con servicio agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Mórrope, a unos 40 minutos del departamento de Lambayeque.  Los pobladores de esta zona se dedican a  la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Blanca se dedica a la crianza, y venta  de animales (ovejas y aves de corral), desde hace 6 años, su corral lo tiene en la parte externa de su domicilio. A sus animales los alimenta con comida  balanceada, granos y pastos naturales, una vez que llegan a su tamaño y peso ideal los vende en el mercado de su distrito o a comerciantes foráneos (personas de otros lugares). Sus ventas incrementaran sus ingresos para cubrir todos sus gastos diarios.  

Ha solicitado  Blanca un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para realizar unos arreglos en el interior de su casa, especialmente su sala que le falta piso y otros acabados.  Con la venta de sus animales va poder pagar el crédito otorgado y mejorar  su calidad de vida, los logros adquiridos por Blanca es gracias a su esfuerzo, trabajo y lo responsable que es como persona.
texts.en:
Blanca is 30 years old and single.  She owns her own home which has piped water and electricity, and is located in Mórrope district, some 40 minutes from Lambayeque department.  The residents of this area work in farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Blanca has been raising and selling animals (sheep and poultry) for six years.  Her farmyard is located outside her home.  She feeds her animals balanced feed, grains and natural pasture.  Once they have reached an ideal size and weight, she sells them in her district market or to traders from outside her area.  Her sales provide her with income which she uses to cover all her daily expenses.

Blanca has requested a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to carry out some repairs inside her home, especially to her living room which needs flooring and other finishing touches.  With the sale of her animals, she will be able to repay her loan and improve her quality of life.  Blanca has achieved what she has thanks to her effort, hard work and responsibility.

loans.use: to improve the interior of her home

loans.name: Levan

texts.en:
Levan is 24 years old. He lives in Samtredia District with his wife, parents, brother and grandmother. 

All members of the family are involved in the family agricultural business. They have a small dairy farm – four cows, whose milk is enough to produce 80 kg cheese per month. The cheese is sold locally. Calves are sold on the local market as well. Also, the family owns 2 ha of agricultural land, where maize is grown. The whole harvest of maize is used on the dairy farm for feeding the cows. They have 900 nut trees, which give them 900 kg of nuts per year. They are sold to retailers. 

Levan plans to rent 3 ha of land. After cultivation watermelons will be sown; Levan already prepared seedlings. Also fertilizers will be purchased and used for the plot. 16% of the total credit will be used for covering an old loan of Levan's, borrowed from Credo. 

Part of the profit will be reinvested in farming in order to expand it and make more sustainable.

loans.use: to pay for tilling the land and fertilizers.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro de 46 años de edad,  es soltero, tiene casa propia con servicio agua y luz, ubicada en el caserio de Huamantanga  que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque y se encuentra a unos 20 minutos aproximadamente.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Pedro se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral donde viven sus animales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta pastos naturales.  Posteriormente vende sus animales una vez que hayan llegado a su tamaño y peso ideal en los diferentes mercados de la ciudad de de la ciudad de Chiclayo y Lambayeque;  incrementando sus ingresos y obteniendo  cosas que le hacen falta en su casa.

El crédito que ha solicitado Pedro es de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme  Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla, será destinado  para la compra de alimentos balanceados ya que por falta de lluvias en esta zona se ha escaseado el pasto y es necesario comprar otros alimentos complementarios para que sigan engorden y desarrollándose normalmente para poder venderlos a un buen precio en elmercado y así poder pagar su préstamo, lo que le ayudara  a mejorar su calidad de vida.

Pedro es una persona trabajadora y empeñosa  que siempre ha sabido salir adelante para mejorar en la vida y poder mejorar en su desarrollo personal.
texts.en:
Pedro, 46, is single.  He has a house of his own with electricity and water located in the Hamlet of Huamantanga which belongs to Lambayeque Department and is about 20 minutes away approximately.  This zone is dedicated to farming, raising livestock and tourism.

Pedro raises sheep to sell.  The corral where his animals live is in his back yard.  He feeds them natural grasses.  Later, once they reach ideal size and weight, he sells them in the various markets in the cities of Chiclayo and Lambayeque thus increasing his income and obtaining the things he needs for his house.

Pedro has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan through the Seed Capital program which will be used to buy nutritionally balanced feed because due to the lack of rain in the zone grass has become scarce and it’s necessary to buy other complimentary feeds so that they will continue to gain weight and develop normally to be sold at a good market price and be able to repay the loan which will greatly help him improve his quality of life.

Pedro is a hard working, dedicated person who has always known how to get ahead to improve in life and in his personal development.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced feed for his sheep.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga nació en la ciudad del Cusco, tiene 32 años y vive en la misma ciudad del Cusco junto con sus 2 hijos. Desde hace 12 años tiene su pequeña ferretería pero el local es alquilado y ella vende por ejemplo herramientas, materiales de construcción y otras cosas más. Ella siempre compra materiales para así abastecerse el negocio. Es su crédito número 2 que tiene con la Asociación Arariwa, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal “Templo del Inca” porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mercedaria como por ejemplo chapas y otras cosas más.

Olga es una mujer emprendedora que saca adelante a sus hijos y su sueño es importar su propia de marca.
texts.en:
Olga was born in Cusco, is 32 years old, and still lives in Cusco with her two children. For 12 years she has been renting a hardware store to sell tools, construction material, as well as other things. She is always buying products to supply her business. This is her second loan with Arariwa Association. She is happy to know she has this financial support since she has already demonstrated responsibility with repayments. She also likes being part of the Communal Bank "Inca Temple" since all of the members are responsible and have great solidarity. With the requested loan she will buy merchandise such as sheet metal and other supplies.

Olga is an enterprising woman who helps her children succeed and her dream is to import her own brand.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sheet metal and other supplies.

loans.name: Timoteo Rumaldo

texts.es:
Timoteo de 42 años de edad, es soltero. Vive en su casa propia en la zona rural, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de agua, ubicada en Corral de Arena a unos 20 minutos del distrito de Olmos y a una hora al departamento de Lambayeque.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería fundamentalmente.

Timoteo se dedica desde hace algún tiempo como estibador (persona que lleva sacos con productos  en la parte posterior de su moto lineal), esta labor lo realiza en las diferentes tierras que cultivan productos comestibles pero en menores cantidades y él se encarga de llevar estos productos a la ciudad para que los vendan, también le encargan traer sacos con fertilizantes para los dueños de las  tierras de cultivo para las cuales trabaja.  Esta actividad le ayudado para poder solventar sus gastos personales.

Por eso ha visto necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 700 nuevos soles para brindarle mantenimiento a su moto lineal ya que es su único medio de trabajo que tiene y necesita tenerla en buen estado para seguir prestando sus servicios eficientemente como hasta el momento.  Timoteo es conocido en la zona por ser una persona muy responsable, trabajadora y con muchas ganas de seguir superándose en la vida.
texts.en:
Timoteo, 42, is single.  He lives in his own house, which only has water, in the rural zone located in Corral de Arena about 20 minutes from Olmos District and an hour from Lambayeque Department.  Throughout this zone residents are fundamentally farmers and raise livestock.

For some time now, Timoteo has worked as a stevedore (a person who transports sacks of products on the back of his motorcycle).  He carries out this work in the various fields where foodstuffs are cultivated but in small quantities.  He takes care of transporting them to the city to be sold.  They also ask him to bring back sacks of fertilizer for the owners of the farmland that he works for.  This activity has made it possible for him to cover his personal expenses.

He now has the need to request a 700 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to service his motorcycle since it’s his only means of work and he has to have it in good working order if he’s to continue providing effective service as he’s been doing so far.  Timoteo is known in the area for being a responsible, hard working person with a strong drive to continue doing better in life.

loans.use: to service his motorcycle.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: La señora Elena tiene un kiosco donde vende almuerzos. El crédito lo requiere para comprar: material de construcción, estuco, pinturas, ya que realizará la obra fina de su vivienda. Vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Ernesto Torrez en la ciudad de La Paz; Elena  es separada y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un préstamo en IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Mrs. Elena has a kiosk where she sells meals. The loan will be used to buy: construction materials, stucco, and paintings for building her home. She lives in her own home located in the Ernesto Torrez area in the city of La Paz. She is separated and has two children. This is the first time she requests a loan from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: buy construction materials, stucco, and paintings for building her home.

loans.name: Tujikwamue - Kiburuga Group

texts.en:
Mwanahadhi, who is in her late twenties, is married and has two children.  She has bee running a business of selling fabrics since 2010. She works from 4.00 am to 6.00 pm daily and she is able to make a small monthly profit. This will be Mwanahadhi's first loan fron Tujijenge Tanzania.  She is requesting a loan to buy more fabrics. Her dream is to own a food cafeteria.

Mwanahadhi will share this loan with her loan group Tujikwamue Kiburugwa, which has 15 members who hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

In the picture Mwanahadhi is in front holding a baby.

loans.use: To purchase fabrics

loans.name: Jimena

texts.es: La señora Jimena se dedica a la venta de productos Herbalife, y trabaja en una empresa constructora. El crédito lo requiere para comprar cemento ya que realizara el vaciado en el patio de la casa donde vive. Vive en casa de parientes  la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Villa Avaroa en la ciudad de La Paz; Jimena  es casada  y tiene un hijo. Es cliente nuestra desde el año 2006 con un excelente historial de pagos.
texts.en: Jimena sells Herbalife products and works in a construction company. She needs the loan to buy cement since she is going to pour it on the patio where she lives. She lives in a house that belongs to some relatives, located in the Villa Avaroa area of the city of La Paz. Jimena is married and has a son. She has been our client since 2006 and has an excellent payment history.

loans.use: to buy cement to cover the patio in the house where she lives.

loans.name: Magali Del Pilar

texts.es:
Magali soltera de 31 años de edad, vive en casa propia con servicio de  agua y luz, ubicada en el caserío Lagunas   a unos 15 minutos de distrito de   Mórrope y a 30 minutos del  departamento de  Lambayeque.  Todas esta zonas se dedica a la actividad agrícola,  ganadera, artesanía  y turismo.

Magali ha puesto  en su domicilio su tienda de productos de primera necesidad (leche, azúcar, arroz, azúcar, todo tipo de golosinas, gaseosas, etc.),  desde hace algún tiempo para seguridad y comodidad de ella y de algún modo pueda atender a cualquier hora a sus  clientes, en la cual  encuentran todo lo que necesitan para su uso diario, con el negocio que ha colocado trata en lo posible de que sus clientes estén satisfechos y por ende tener  un mejor nivel de vida.

Mediante una visita a Edpyme Alternativa Magali trata de adquirir un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para abastecer su tienda de más insumos y así pueda satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, con la finalidad de incrementar  sus ingresos.  

Magali es conocida por sus vecinos, por ser una mujer  alegre, dispuesta a ayudar a otros y con esfuerzo y trabajo salir adelante.
texts.en:
Magali, 31, is single.  She lives in her own house, which has electricity and water, located in the Lagunas hamlet about 15 minutes from Mórrope district and 30 minutes from Lambayeque Department.  The entire zone is dedicated to farming, raising livestock, crafts and tourism.

Magali set up a grocery store in her house (milk, sugar, rice, all sorts of snacks, soft drinks, etc.) some time ago for her comfort and security and to be able to tend to customers at any moment; they can find everything they need for their daily use here.  She does her best in her business to see that her customers are satisfied and as a result she can have a better life.

Through a visit to Edpyme Alternativa she tries to acquire a loan of 1000 new soles to stock her store with more items so that she can meet customer demand with the goal of increasing her income.

Magali is known by her neighbors for being a cheerful woman who is always willing to help others and to get ahead in life through her effort and work.

loans.use: to stock her store with foodstuffs.

loans.name: Wakorintho Group

texts.en:
Joyce , who is in her early forties, is married with 3 adult children and one still in school.  She has three different kinds of businesses.  She has poultry, sells fabrics and liquid soap since 1996.  She works from 9.00am to 7.30pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Joyce's 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She hopes for a loan to increase fabric stock, buy raw materials for making more liquid soap and to buy more chicks.  Her dream is to one day take her last born up to the university.

Joyce will take this loan with her loan group "Wakorintho" which has a total of 21 members, who will hold each other  accountable in paying back their loans.

In the picture, Joyce is 1st on the left, 1st row.

loans.use: To buy more chicks, fabrics and materials to make liquid soap.

loans.name: Leandro

texts.es: El señor Leandro trabaja como chofer propietario en la línea de radio taxi “Simón Bolívar” TRUFI 5 y su esposa se dedica a labores de casa. El crédito lo requiere para realizar el mantenimiento de su vehiculo, esto para desempeñar con mayor seguridad su trabajo. Vive en casa propia  la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz. Leandro es casado y tiene tres hijos.
texts.en: Mr. Leandro is the owner and driver of a taxi with the Simón Bolívar trufi 5 union. His wife works in the house. He needs this loan to perform maintenance on his vehicle, which will make performing his job safer. He lives in a house he owns that is located in the Achachicala area of the city of La Paz. Leandro is married and has three children.

loans.use: perform maintenance on his radio taxi

loans.name: Magdali

texts.es:
Magdali, es casada con el señor José Ariel, con quien procreo  tres hijos Edna Karina de dieciocho  años, linda Areli de trece años y José Ignacio de siete años.

    Ella se dedica  a su pequeño negocio de tacos  en donde lleva dos años y cuatro meses y solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ingredientes como son:  carne, tortilla, repollo, tomate, chiles, y así poder elaborarlo como sus clientes lo desean.

    Comenta que fue su mama quien la enseño  a ser dependiente  de sí misma porque cuando se casara  ya sabría dedicarse a un trabajo del cual pudiera  apoyar a su esposo y así lograr  tener ingresos en su hogar.

     Su más grande sueño es salir adelante y con el tiempo tener más grande su taquería así poder apoyar a su hijos estaña estudiando.
texts.en:
Magdali is married to José Ariel, with whom she has three children, Edna Karina, 18, beautiful Areli, 13, and José Ignacio, 7.

She has a small taco business which she has run for 2 years and 4 months. She requests the loan to invest in purchasing ingredients, including meat, tortillas, cabbage, tomatoes and chiles, so she can make her tacos however her customers want them. 

She says it was her mom who taught her to be independent because then when she married she would already know how to work at something and would be able to help her husband and have an income for her household. Her greatest dream is to get ahead and eventually expand her taco business so she can help her children with their education.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients, including meat, tortillas and cabbage, to make tacos.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca madre D. familia  45 años D. edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo e hijos, cuenta con servicio D. agua y luz, ubicada en la provincia D. Chiclayo.  Se caracteriza por la actividad comercial, agricultura  y turismo.

Francisca ha implementado en su domicilio su tienda D. productos D. primera necesidad (leche, azúcar, arroz, azúcar, gaseosas, todo tipo D. golosinas, etc.),  para seguridad y comodidad D. ella y D. algún modo pueda atender a cualquier hora a sus  clientes, en la cual  encuentran todo lo que necesitan para su uso diario, con el negocio que ha colocado trata en lo posible D. que sus clientes estén satisfechos y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su hogar. 

Ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa adquirir un préstamo D. 1500 nuevos soles para abastecer su tienda D. diversa mercadería (productos comestibles) y así pueda satisfacer las necesidades D. sus clientes, con la finalidad D. incrementar  sus ingresos para pagar su préstamo y mejorar su negocio.  Francisca es conocida en la zona  por ser una persona amable, responsable y muy trabajadora, siempre con ganas sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisca is a 45 year-old mother who lives in her own home with her husband and their children.  Her home has water and electrical services, and is located in the province of Chiclayo, an area characterized by its commercial activity, agriculture and tourism.

Francisca has set up a grocery store in her home where she sells basic consumer goods (milk, sugar, rice, soft drinks, all types of sweets, etc.)  This allows her to have security and comfort, and makes it possible for her to attend to her customers at all hours.  In her store, her customers find everything to meet their daily needs.  With her business, she tries as much as she can to satisfy her customers and improve the quality of life of her household.

She is requesting a loan of 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to stock her store with a variety of merchandise (groceries) so that she can satisfy the needs of her customers.   Her goal is to increase her income so that she can pay off her loan and improve her business.  Francisca is known in the neighborhood as a friendly person who is responsible and very hardworking, who is always striving to get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store

loans.name: Roger

texts.es: El señor Roger trabaja como secretario con un abogado. El crédito lo requiere para el costo de ingreso a la universidad.  Con esta actividad solventa los gastos que tiene. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz;  es soltero y no tiene hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su crédito se canaliza a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Roger is secretary to a lawyer. The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for university registration fees. Thanks to his job he is able to pay for his expenses. He lives in his parents' house in Tambladerani, a neighborhood of the town of La Paz; he is single and has no children. This is the second time his has requested a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: To pay for univertisy registration fees.

loans.name: Blanca Luz

texts.es:
La señora Blanca Luz, vive en el Barrio Concepción de Copainala Estado de Chiapas. Ella es viuda y tuvo cuatro hijos quienes ya están casados: francisco de treinta años, Israel de  veinte  ocho años, Efraín de veinticinco años y David de veinte tres y la apoyan con los ingreso de su hogar.

    Ella se dedica a la elaboración de comida, como son: pollo fritos, pollo en caldo, bistec, carne de puerco frito, entre otros y solicito el préstamo para la compra de ingredientes y así poder elaborarlo, como son: carne, verduras, tortilla, entre otros, y comenta que le va bien pues con ello está logrando salir adelante.

     Ella inicio por su propio creatividad, para así tener ingresos y cubrir su gastos que se generan en su vida diaria a un así también apoya a su  nuera con el crecimiento de su nieta.

     Su más grande deseo es tener  un local en donde pueda vender mas cómoda mente la comidas que elabora, así también darle un mejor servicio a sus clientes que le compran del diario.
texts.en:
Blanca Luz lives in the Concepción neighborhood of Copainala in the state of Chiapas. She is a widow and has four children who are already married and help support her: Francisco, 30, Israel, 28, Efraín, 25, and David, 23. 

She works making foods to sell, such as fried chicken, chicken soup, beefsteak, fried pork, and others. She requests the loan to purchase ingredients for her foods, including meat, vegetables and tortillas. 

She says things are going well for her and with this income she is managing to make ends meet. She started her business on her own so she could have an income and cover the expenses she has in her daily life, as well as to help her daughter-in-law raise her granddaughter. Her greatest desire is to have a location where she could more comfortably sell the foods she makes, as well as provide better service to her customers so they will come every day.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making food.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es una madre D. familia D. 58 años D. edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijos, la cual cuenta con todos los servicio básico (agua, luz y desagüe), ubicada en el distrito D. Chepén, la misma que se encuentra a una hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo y a 2 horas del departamento D. la Libertad (Trujillo).  Todas estas zonas se caracterizan por la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

María se dedica desD. hace unos 8 años a la venta D. huevos D. codorniz en una carretilla, en el parque central D. este distrito donD. hay más tráfico D. personas y sus ventas sean mayores para poder solventar sus gastos familiares.

A solicitado María un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1500 nuevos soles para realizar unas mejoras en el interior D. su casa, ya que desea tener un lugar más acogedor para sus hijos.  María es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable que con los ingresos que deje su negocio podrá cubrir su préstamo y brindarle  un mejor nivel D. vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a 58-year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in their own home, which has the basic utilities (water, electricity, and a drainage system). The house is located in the Chepén district, which is an hour away from the city of Chiclayo and 2 hours from the department of La Libertad (Trujillo). This area is known for agriculture, stockbreeding, and tourism.

For 8 years, Maria has been selling quail eggs from a cart in a central park of the district where there is a lot of foot traffic, thus sales are high and she can pay for the family expenses.

Maria has requested a 1,500.00 PEN loan from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can remodel the interior of her home because she wants to offer her children an more welcoming place. Maria is a very hardworking and responsible person who will be able to repay her loan and give her family a better quality of life with her earnings.

loans.use: to improve the interior of her home.

loans.name: Lorena Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lorena del Carmen es casada con el señor Efraín, en donde procrearon a una hija de nombre Surani Guadalupe de ocho años.

    Ella es la tercera vez que solicita el crédito pero esta  vez cambio de actividad y es para invertirlo  en la compra de mercancía para surtir su tienda de abarrotes, en donde nos comenta que inicio hace cuatro meses y ve que le está dando resultado en la ganancia.

    En esta actividad la animo un hermano suyo quien también se dedica a lo mismo, pues él le daría la mercancía un mejor precio para así tener algo mejor que le ganancias así mas adelante agrandarlo con cosa de mejor calidad.

    su más grande deseo es que con esta actividad pueda ahorrar para que con el tiempo tenga más grande su negocio y sea distribuidora para otros que a un están iniciando.
texts.en:
Lorena del Carmen is married to Efraín, and they have a daughter, Surani Guadalupe, who is eight years old.

This is the third time she has requested a loan, even though this time she has changed activity: the loan she is requesting will be used to buy products to supply her general store. She told us she opened her shop four months ago, and since then it has provided her with a steady income.

One of her brothers encouraged her to open her shop, as he himself engages in the same kind of activity. However, in her shoes, he would sell her products at higher prices, in order to increase the income, so that in the future she would be able to improve the shop by offering better quality products.

Her biggest wish for her activity is that it will allow her to save enough money to enlarge her shop in the future; she also wishes to become a supplier for other shopkeepers starting up their activities.

loans.use: To buy products for her shop such as beans, sugar, oil and eggs.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: La señora Virginia se dedica a la venta de edredones para camas y también trabaja como empleada en una embajada. El crédito lo requiere para aumentar el capital, pues  requiere adquirir edredones para este invierno y de distintos colores; esta actividad es la fuente que tiene para complementar sus ingresos que tiene para mantener a su familia Vive en alquiler la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz;  es casada y  tiene tres hijos. Virginia es cliente de Impro desde el año 2008.
texts.en: Virginia engages in selling comforters and she is also works in an embassy. The loan she is requesting will be used to increase he working capital, as she needs to buy comforters in different colors for this coming winter. This activity is her main source of income she can count on to provide for her family. She lives in a rented house in Tembladerani, a neighborhood of the city of La Paz; she is married and she has 3 children. Virginia has been a Impro customer since 2008.

loans.use: To buy comforters in different colors to sell them to her customers.

loans.name: Felicitas Hermelinda

texts.es: Felicitas nació en la ciudad del Juliaca, tiene 43 años y vive en la ciudad del Cusco junto con sus 3 hijos. Desde hace 3 años que se dedica a la artesanía y tiene dos locales uno propio y otro alquilado y sus locales tiene un nombre particular “Artesanía Melina”. Ella siempre compra artesanía de tipo bisutería, platería y tejidos. Es uno de los varios créditos que tiene con la Asociación Arariwa, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal “Templo del Inca” porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mercadería como por ejemplo collares, anillos, aretes, pulseras y otras cosas más.
texts.en: Felicitas was born in the city of Juliaca. She is 43 and lives in Cusco with her 3 children. For 3 years she has worked as an artisan and has two shops, one that she owns and the other rented, both called "Artesanía Melina." She always buys handiwork such as costume jewelry, silver and textiles. This is one of several loans she has had with the Arariwa Association, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support and therefore she has always shown herself to be responsible in her payments. She is also grateful to be part of her communal bank "Templo del Inca" because all of the members are responsible people and very supportive. She is grateful to those people who will fund this loan which will be very useful in the growth of her business. With the requested loan she will purchase merchandise such as necklaces, rings, earrings, bracelets, and other things.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as necklaces, rings, earrings, bracelets and other things.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
La  señora Sandra, es casada con el señor David, con quien procreo dos hijos David Emanuel de 10 años  en quinto de primaria y el más pequeño es Jareth Julián  de un años  quienes son su razón de trabajar.

  Ella estudio lo que es belleza  profesional, y solicito el préstamo para comprar su material que utiliza para su estética como: tintes para el cabello, tratamiento de capilar, y  de colorantes,  entre otros, en donde lleva dos años y nueves meses.

   Se dedica a esta actividad  ya que sus papas la apoyaron a que estudie una carrera y le ayude mas adelante con sus ingresó de su hogar ya que lo termino cuando estaba casada y gracias adiós logro terminarla.

    Su más grande deseo es que con el tiempo pueda tener ahorrar para comprar materiales y mandar a construir su estética y tenga más clientela para así tener su trabajo en donde logre salir adelante con su pequeña familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Sandra is married to Mr. David with whom she has two children: David Emanuel, 10, and if fifth grade and Jareth Julián, 1. They are the reasons she works.

She studied to be a professional Beautician and asked for the loan to buy the supplies she uses in her salon like: hair color, scalp treatments, dyes, among others.  She’s been in business two years and nine months.

She is in this business because her parents supported her so that she could study a career that would help her later on with income for her home since she finished her training when she was already married and, thanks be to God, she managed to complete it.

Her greatest wish is that in time she’ll have savings to buy materials to build her salon and have more customers to have work and get ahead with her small family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Ufani Soledad

texts.es:
Soledad nació en la ciudad del Ayacucho, tiene 43 años y vive en la ciudad del Cusco junto con sus 3 hijos. Desde hace varios meses atrás que trabaja como ejecutiva en la Organización Clásica (Clásica se encarga de vender utensilios de cocina). Ella también tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio. Desde hace 10 años que tiene la tienda y por el momento en las mañanas sus hijos atienden el negocio y ella por las tardes. Ella siempre compra mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche en tarro y otras cosas más para así abastecer la tienda.   

Ella tiene crédito con  la Asociación Arariwa, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal “Templo del Inca” porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, fideos, azúcar y otras cosas más.

Soledad es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora que saca adelante sus hijos y su sueño es abrir una distribuidora de venta de utensilios de cocina.
texts.en:
Soledad was born in the town of Ayacucho. She is 43 years old and lives in Cusco with her three children. She has worked for several months as an executive with Clásica, a company that sells cooking utensils. Soledad also runs a small grocery business from her home. She’s had this business for ten years, and right now her children look after the store in the morning and she does the afternoons. She buys merchandise such as rice, sugar, pasta, and canned milk to sell in the store.

Soledad has a loan with Kiva partner Asociación Arariwa. She is very happy to know that she has this financial support and has always been very responsible with paying back the loan. She is also pleased to be part of the ‘Templo del Inca’ Community Bank because the members are responsible people and very committed.

Soledad wishes to thank all those who contribute to her loan which will be very useful in helping her with the business. With the money she will buy rice, sugar, pasta etc.  She is a hardworking, enterprising woman who is helping her children make their way in the world. Her dream is to open a distributorship for the sale of cooking utensils.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, pasta etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to provide motorcycle taxi maintenance and to cover personal expenses.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luis nació en la ciudad de Abancay del departamento de Apurímac, tiene 28 años y vive en la ciudad del Cusco junto con sus padres. Jose Luis es técnico dental y desde varios años tiene su propio laboratorio dental. El es una persona responsable que actualmente estudia la carrera profesional de odontología en la Universidad Privada de Alas Peruanas y está cursando el tercer año de estudio. Jose Luis tiene crédito con  la Asociación Arariwa, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal “Templo del Inca” porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, será para implementar el laboratorio y comprara materiales como masillas, amalgamas y también para pagar sus matriculas dela universidad.  

Jose Luis es persona emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante su profesión y su sueño es abrir una clínica odontológica.
texts.en:
Jose Luis was born in Abancay in the department of Apurímac. He is 28 years old and lives in Cusco with his parents. He is a dental technician and has had his own laboratory for several years. He is a responsible person and is currently studying to become an odontologist at the Universidad Privada de Alas Peruanas. He’s in his third year.

Jose Luis has a loan with Kiva partner Asociación Arariwa. He is very happy to know that he has this financial support and has always been very responsible with paying back the loan. He is also pleased to be part of the ‘Templo del Inca’ Community Bank because the members are responsible people and very committed.

Jose Luis wishes to thank all those who contribute to his loan which will be very useful in helping him with the business. With the money he plans to buy items for the laboratory such as filler and amalgam, as well as pay his university fees. He is a hardworking, enterprising person who wants to get ahead in his career. His dream is to open an odontology clinic.

loans.use: to buy items for his laboratory such as filler and amalgam, as well as pay his university fees

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: Lourdes trabaja como empleada en una institución pública. El crédito lo requiere para pagar talleres y seminarios que le servirán para ascender en su trabajo. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Alto Chijini de la ciudad de La Paz;  es soltera y no tiene hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su préstamo es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Lourdes works in a public institution. She is requesting a loan to pay for workshops and seminars she needs to attend in order to progress in her job. She lives in her parents' house, located in Alto Chijini, a neighborhood of the city of La Paz; she is single and has no children. This is the second time she has requested a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: To pay for workshops and seminars to improve her working competences.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis Alfredo nació en la ciudad de Puno, tiene 56 años y vive en la ciudad del Cusco junto con sus 3 hijos. Desde dos años y medio que tiene un pequeña restaurante – pollería, Luis Alfredo es el administrador de su restaurante que tiene como nombre particular “El Fogón”. Luis Alfredo tiene crédito con  la Asociación Arariwa, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal “Templo del Inca” porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, será para implementar el local para brindar mejor el servicio y desea comprar ollas, cocinas y muebles.
 
Luis Alfredo es persona emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante sus hijos y su sueño es abrir una cadena de restaurantes - pollerias.
texts.en:
Luis Alfredo was born in the city of Puno. He is 56 years old and lives in the city of Cuzco with his 3 children. For two years and a half he has had a small restaurant, a chicken restaurant. Luis Alfredo is the manager of his restaurant, which is named “El Fogón”. Luis Alfredo has a loan with the Asociación Arariwa. He is very happy to know that he has financial support, since he has always shown himself to be responsible with his payments. He also enjoys being a part of his community bank called “Templo del Inca” [Inca Temple], because all of its members are responsbible and very supportive. He is grateful to those people who will be the lenders and it will be very useful in his business' progress. With the loan he is asking for he will outfit his locale to offer a better service. He wants to buy pots, stoves and furniture.  
 
Luis Alfredo is an enterprising and hardworking person who is getting his children ahead. His dream is to open a chain of chicken restaurants.

loans.use: to offer better service, and to buy pots, stoves and furniture.

loans.name: Felipe Santiago

texts.es: Felipe Santiago tiene su negocio que es brindar el servicio de taxi. Tiene más de 37 años, que se dedica a este negocio pues siempre ha buscado la forma de brindarles el mejor servicio a sus clientes. Las ganas de salir adelante con su negocio han hecho que Felipe dedique una buena parte de su tiempo pues trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, todos los días.  El motivo del crédito es para la compra de llantas, brindarle mantenimiento a su automóvil, focos y otros arreglos que necesita. Felipe es una persona muy responsable y disfruta mucho de su actividad.
texts.en:
Felipe Santiago owns a business that provides taxi services. he has worked in the business for over 37 years and he always looks at ways of providing the best customer service. His eagerness to make the business successful means that Felipe devotes much of his time to it. He works from 8 in the morning to 9 in the evening every day. 

The loan is to pay for tires, vehicle maintenance, lights and other repairs needed. Felipe is a very responsible person and really enjoys what he does for a living.

loans.use: to pay for tires, vehicle maintenance, lights and other repairs needed.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente de 20 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, la   misma que no tiene los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del caserío el Totoral que pertenece al distrito de Tambogrande, a unos 40 minutos del departamento de Piura.  Esta zona la actividad principal es la agricultura y ganadería y artesanía (alfarería y metalurgia).

Vicente desde hace 2 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado porcino (cerdos) y caprino (cabras), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo y luego pueda ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos personales.

Ha solicitado Vicente un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 600 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados para su ganado, ya que alimentándolos bien con la finalidad de obtener un mejor precio en los mercados donde los ofrece en venta a su clientela que le compra  por la confianza que tiene su producto y así mejoraría  su calidad de vida.

Vicente es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su negocio cresca cada vez más y brindarle algunas comodidades a sus padres.
texts.en:
Vicente is a 20-year-old single man who lives in his parents' house, which does not have basic utilities, in a rural area called El Totoral.
