Every thirty days, the members of the "Todos Unidos" (Everyone United) community bank meet in Asociación Arariwa's central office, in Cusco, Peru.  This city has been known for many years as the "Archaeological Capital of America".

Here we meet Antonio, a member of the bank, who tells us that he was born in the city of Puno, is 55 years old, married, and has three children.

Since the year 2000, Antonio has been selling decorative accessories and spare parts for cars.  He has a sales location "Auto Partes San Pedro" in a shopping center but he rents his premises.  On this occasion, Antonio needs a loan to buy merchandise such as, for example, decorative accessories, radios, horns, tires, jacks, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as decorative accessories, radios, horns, tires, jacks, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
En el departamento del Cusco conocido desde hace muchos años como la "Capital Arqueológica de América", se reúnen cada treinta días las socias del Banco Comunal “Todos Unidos” en la oficinas central de la Asociación Arariwa, Cusco, Perú.

En este banco comunal conocimos a la señora Rosa Elena y nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad de Arequipa, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos. 

Rosa Elena desde el año 2000 que se dedica a vender adornos y auto partes para automóviles, ella tiene un puesto de venta que está alquilado en el centro comercial “Auto Partes San Pedro” de la ciudad del Cusco. En esta oportunidad Rosa Elena requiere el préstamo para comprar mercedaria como por ejemplo adornos, radios, bocinas, llantas, gatas y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Every thirty days, the members of the "Todos Unidos" (Everyone United) community bank meet in Asociación Arariwa's central office, in the city of Cusco, in Cusco department, Peru.  For many years, this area has been known as the "Archaeological Capital of America".

Here we meet Rosa Elena, a member of the bank, who tells us that she was born in the city of Arequipa, is 54 years old, married, and has three children.

Since the year 2000, Rosa Elena has been selling decorative accessories and spare parts for cars.  She has a sales location which she rents in the "Auto Partes San Pedro" shopping center, in the city of Cusco.  On this occasion, Rosa Elena needs a loan to buy merchandise such as, for example, decorative accessories, radios, horns, tires, jacks, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as decorative accessories, radios, horns, tires, jacks, etc.

loans.name: Solidario San Pedro Sacatepequez Group

texts.es:
Solidario San Pedro Sacatepequez: este Grupo Esta Formado por tres Señoras,
la Señora Trinidad ella se dedica a la venta de frutas en el mercado de su comunidad tambien en sus tiempos libres se dedica a la venta de ropa tipica,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de frutas y verduras,ya que nos comenta que nececita mas capital para trabajar,siendo ella la lider de este grupo, las otras socias se didecan a la venta de banano y venta de licuados,tambien ellas estan solicitando este credito tener mas capital de trabajo,ya que sus ventas han crecido y nececitan mas capital de trabajar el sueño de ellas es tener un local mas grande y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
The San Pedro Sacatepequez Solidarity Group consists of three ladies.

Sra. Trinidad sells fruit at the community market.  In her free time, she also sells traditional clothing.  Trinidad is requesting a loan to buy fruits and vegetables.  She says that she is in need of additional operating capital.  Trinidad is the leader of this group.

The other members sell bananas and smoothies.  They also are requesting a loan so that they will have additional operating capital to help them increase sales.

All of them dream of having larger storefronts and generating more income.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Maria Flor

texts.es:
María es una señora casada D. 57  años D. edad, vive en casa propia  en el caserío Lagartera (comunidad rural D. condición baja y en pleno desarrollo), ubicado a 18 minutos D. L. ciudad D. Mórrope en Lambayeque.

María se dedica a L. crianza y venta D. animales elL. cuenta con ganado porcino, el cual cría en corrales ubicados en L. parte exterior D. su domicilio y los negocia quincenalmente.  Con L. venta D. estos animales María ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. El esposo D. María se dedica a L. agricultura.

María solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo D. 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en L. compra D. alimento para sus animales así como en las labores agrícolas D. su esposo.

Esta pareja cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales.
texts.en:
María is a married woman who is 57 years of age. She lives in her own home in the village of Lagartera, a lower-class rural community that is in a development phase. This area is located 18 minutes away from the city of Mórrope in Lambayeque.

María raises and sells animals. She has her own pigs that she keeps in pens located in an area outsiD. of her home. María conducts her business every 15 days. With the sale of these animals, María is able to help her husband with the household expenses. Her husband is a farmer.

María is requesting a loan of 1000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy feed for her animals, as well as pay farm workers to help her husband.

María and her husband have good personal and work-related references.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed for her animals and to pay farm workers to help her husband.

loans.name: Rolando Jose

texts.es: Rolando José tiene 38 años, se dedica a brindar el servicio de soldadura. Tiene más de 10 años de tener este negocio, aprendió a salir adelante con su negocio pues tenía que brindarle a su familia el alimento diario, su familia la conforman sus 3 hijos y su esposa, ellos ayudan a Rolando en lo que más pueden pues les gusta mucho ayudar a su Papa. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de guantes, varias, lentes, entre otros productos que son necesarios. Sueña con mejorar con construir una casa para sus hijos.
texts.en: Rolando José is 38 years old and works as a welder.  He has been in this business for more than 10 years.  He learned to get ahead in his business as he had to provide for his family.  He is married and has three children who help Rolando with whatever they can because they really enjoy helping their dad.  Rolando is requesting this loan to buy gloves, rods, goggles and other products which he needs.  He dreams of improving his business and building a home for his children.

loans.use: to buy gloves, rods, goggles and other products that he needs

loans.name: Rene Wildon

texts.es:
En el departamento del Cusco; capital Cusco, este es conocido desde hace muchos años como la "Capital Arqueológica de América" y donde se reúnen cada treinta días los socios del Banco Comunal “Todos Unidos” en la oficinas central de la Asociación Arariwa, Cusco, Perú.

En este banco comunal conocimos al señor Wildon y nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad de Cusco en el populoso distrito de Santiago, él tiene 33 años de edad, está casado y fruto de esta relación tiene dos hijos. 

Wildon desde hace 9 años que se dedica a la venta de adornos y auto partes para automóviles en el centro comercial “Auto Partes San Pedro” de la ciudad del Cusco. Wildon no tiene un puesto propio sino alquilado, el trabaja desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche todos los días de la semana. En esta oportunidad Wildon requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo micas, faros, direccionales, bujías y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Every thirty days, the members of the "Todos Unidos" (Everyone United) community bank meet in Asociación Arariwa's central office, in the city of Cusco, in Cuso department, Peru.  For many years, this area has been known as the "Archaeological Capital of America".

Here we meet Wildon who is a member of the bank.  He tells us that he was born in the city of Cusco, in the densely-populated Santiago district.  He is 33 years old, married, and has two children.

For nine years, Wildon has been selling decorative accessories and spare parts for cars in the "Auto Partes San Pedro" shopping center, in the city of Cusco.  Wildon does not own his own sales location but rents instead.  He works from 7.00am to 7.00pm every day of the week.  On this occasion, Wildon needs a loan to buy merchandise such as decals, headlamps, turn signals (indicators), spark plugs, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as decals, headlamps, turn signals (indicators), spark plugs, etc.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es:
En el departamento del Cusco, capital Cusco conocido desde hace muchos años como la "Capital Arqueológica de América", se reúnen cada treinta días las socias del Banco Comunal “Todos Unidos” en la oficinas central de la Asociación Arariwa, Cusco, Perú.

En este banco comunal conocimos a la señora Lizbeth y nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad de Juliaca, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene dos hijos. 

Lizbeth y su esposo tienen un puesto de venta en el centro comercial “Auto Apartes San Pedro” de la ciudad del cusco, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con la atención del negocio. En esta oportunidad Lizbeth requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo micas, motores, chumaceras, radiadores, pistones, radios y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Every thirty days, the members of the "Todos Unidos" (Everyone United) community bank meet in Asociación Arariwa's central office, in the city of Cusco, in Cusco department, Peru.  For many years this area has been known as the "Archaeological Capital of America".

Here we meet Lizbeth who is a member of the bank.  She tells us that she was born in the city of Juliaca, is 27 years old, married, and has two children.

Liabeth and her husband have a sales location in the "Auto Partes San Pedro" shopping center, in the city of Cusco.  She divides her time between her daily activities and serving in the business.  On this occasion, Lizbeth needs a loan to buy merchandise such as decals, engines, radiators, pistons, radios, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as decals, engines, radiators, pistons, radios, etc.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa es una madre de familia de 40 años de edad, ella vive en casas propia junto a su esposo y sus dos pequeños hijos en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope en Lambayeque. Esta es una comunidad pequeña de gente muy trabajadora.

Teresa se dedica a la comercialización de comida para aves, tanto de engorde como de crecimiento y venta de medicina para su cuidado. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 4 años y  el negocio esta situado en su domicilio
Teresa cuenta con una buena demanda debido a que la zona de Mórrope es principalmente agricultora y ganadera y la mayoría de familias cría animales que luego comercializan. Teresa también cuenta con aves de corral que cría para comercializarlas. 

Teresa solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de alimento balanceado y de engorde para su negocio así como para alimentar a sus aves de corral.

Teresa es un cliente antiguo de Edpyme Alternativa y tiene un buen historial crediticio.
texts.en:
Teresa is a 40-year-old mother who lives in her own home with her husband and two young children. They reside in the rural section of the District of Mórrope in Lambayeque. This is a small community where the people work extremely hard.

Teresa sells poultry feed for fattening birds as they grow. She also sells medicines used in their care. She has been in business for four years and conducts her sales from her home.

Teresa experiences a good level of demand since Mórrope is mainly devoted to agriculture and livestock breeding. Most of the local families raise animals to sell. Teresa also has a chicken coop where she raises poultry to sell.

She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN to invest in the purchase of balanced feed for fattening. She will sell this in her business, as well as set aside a portion to feed her own birds.

Teresa is a long-time client of Edpyme Alternativa and possesses a good credit history.

loans.use: To purchase balanced poultry feed to sell.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
En el departamento del Cusco, capital Cusco conocido desde hace muchos años como la "Capital Arqueológica de América", se reúnen cada treinta días las socias del Banco Comunal “Todos Unidos” en la oficina central de la Asociación Arariwa, Cusco, Perú.

En este banco comunal conocimos a la señora Margarita y nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad de Andahuaylillas, tiene 50 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos. 

Es ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de comida en el mercado central “San Pedro” de la ciudad del Cusco. Margarita desde hace 27 años que tiene su propio local en el mercado, ella prepara la comida desde las 4 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la mañana por lo tanto ella sale a vender a las 6:30 de la mañana hasta las 5 de a tarde todos los días. En esta oportunidad Margarita requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo arroz, fideos, verduras, carnes y otras cosas que se necesita para preparar los platos de comida.
texts.en:
Every thirty days, the members of the "Todos Unidos" (Everyone United) community bank meet in Asociación Arariwa's central office, in the city of Cusco, in Cusco department, Peru.  For many years, this area has been known as the "Archaeological Capital of America".

Here we meet Margarita who is a member of the bank.  She tells us that she was born in the city of Andahuaylillas, is 50 years old, married, and has four children.

Margarita is a housewife who, in order to make her own money, also sells meals in the "San Pedro" central market in the city of Cusco.  Margarita has owned her own premises in the market for 27 years.  She prepares her meals from 4.00am to 6.00am and goes out to sell them from 6.30am to 5.00pm, every day.  On this occasion, Margarita needs a loan to buy supplies such as rice, noodles, vegetables, meat and other items that she needs to make her meals.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice, noodles, vegetables, meat, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María tiene 51 años, asegura que se siente feliz al haber conformado una familia unida. Pues se casó hace varios años y fruto esta relación tiene dos hijos. Maria desde hace 10 años que se dedica al negocio de venta de adornos y autopartes, ella tiene una puesto de venta alquilado en el centro comercial “Auto Partes San Pedro” y hay veces viaja a la ciudad de Lima para comprar mercadería y en otras ocasiones sus proveedoras le envían de la ciudad de Lima. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Juntos Unidos”, y este es el quinceavo ciclo de crédito con La Asociación Arariwa, donde está seguro que accederá a futuros créditos porque refiere que con sus ahorros, sus pagos puntuales, más el trabajo activo que desempeña en su banco comunal garantizan como una persona responsable. Con el dinero solicitado, invertirá en el pago de la mercadería que le proveerán por ejemplo le van a traer adorno, pararrayos, radios, faros y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and says that she feels happy to have created a united family.  She married years ago and has two children.  For ten years, María has been selling decorative accessories and spare parts for cars.  She has a rented sales location in the "Auto Partes San Pedro" shopping center.  Sometimes she travels to the city of Lima to buy merchandise and sometimes her suppliers send her goods from the city of Lima.

María is a member of the "Juntos Unidos" community bnk and this is her 15th loan cycle with Asociación Arariwa.  She is certain that she will access future loans because her savings, her punctual repayments and the active work that she carries out as a member of her community bank all guarantee her as a responsible person.

María will use the money she has requested to invest in buying merchandise from her suppliers such as decorative accessories, lightning conductors, radios, headlamps, etc.

loans.use: to invest in buying merchandise from her suppliers such as decorative accessories, lightning conductors, radios, headlamps, etc.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora Maria Guadalupe esta solicitando un préstamo para poder terminar los acabados del interior, exterior y la elaboración de la barda trasera de la vivienda. 
Ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para poder comprar el material que es cemento, pintura y block, para que este terminada ya la vivienda. Así sus hijos y su mama quine vive con ella este mas cómodos y seguros en la casa. 
Doña Maria Guadalupe es empleada de una compañía hotelera como promotora de eventos este sueldo es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia y con una parte será para pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Maria Guadalupe is requesting a loan so that she can finish off some work to the inside and outside of her home and build a wall out back.

Maria Guadalupe does not have the money she needs to buy the materials (cement, paint and blocks) to finish off this work to her home.  The work will make her children and her mom, who lives with her, more comfortable and safe at home.

Maria Guadalupe works for a hotel company as an events promoter.  Her wage is the source of income that she has for supporting her family.  She will use part of her wage to repay her loan.

loans.use: to do some final work on the inside and outside of her home and to build a wall out the back of her home

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy bales of cotton clothes for resale.

loans.name: Carla Luisa

texts.es:
En el departamento del Cusco, capital Cusco conocido desde hace muchos años como la "Capital Arqueológica de América", se reúnen cada treinta días las socias del Banco Comunal “Todos Unidos” en la oficinas central de la Asociación Arariwa, Cusco, Perú.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Carla Luisa, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos. 

Es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de ropa los días sábados en el centro comercial confraternidad de la ciudad del Cusco.  Ella también vende cosméticos y trabaja cada tres días a la semana y su forma de venta es de puerta a puerta y bajo pedido, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Sus productos los recibe en su casa y lo que es ropa compra de los proveedores. Tiene dos años que se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y le va muy bien. Nos cuenta que los pantalones son muy solicitadas por sus clientes ya que son bonitos y a precios razonables.

En esta oportunidad requiere el microcrédito para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa.
texts.en:
In Cusco, capital of the department of Cusco -- known for many years as the "Archaeological Capital of the Americas" -- the members of the "Todos Unidos" ["All United"] communal bank meet every thirty days in the central offices of the Arariwa Association, Cusco, Peru.

In this place, we find Carla Luisa, who is 33 years old and married, with two children from this relationship. 

She is a housewife, and to obtain her own resources, she works selling clothing on Saturdays in the Confraternidad shopping center of the city of Cusco. She also sells cosmetics and works every three days during the week. Her selling method is door to door and on order. She provides her products on credit and collects payments each week. She receives deliveries of her products at home, and she buys the clothing she sells from suppliers. She has worked selling cosmetics for two years, and it is going very well for her. She reports that pants are especially in demand among her customers, since they are attractive and offered at reasonable prices. 

At this time she needs the microloan to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and clothing.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Luz Marleni

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer emprendedora de 43 años de edad, el producto de su esfuerzo le permitió tener una casa propia en la zona urbana marginal (clase muy baja)  de José Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo.

Desde hace 2 años Luz cuenta con un  puesto de ropa para niños, ubicado en los exteriores del mercado de su distrito. Tiene buena cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus productos y ella cuenta con una experiencia ineludible. Desde muy joven Luz se ha dedicado a las ventas y es por ello que conoce este rubro a la perfección.

Luz cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales.

Ella solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de mercadería, prendas de vestir, para expandir sus ventas. 

Luz es un cliente recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa, cumplió con puntualidad su crédito anterior.
texts.en:
Luz is an enterprising woman who is 43 years of age. As a result of her efforts, she was able to acquire her own home in the lower-class urban area of José Leonardo Ortiz in Chiclayo.

For the past two years, Luz has managed a vending post located outside of the district market where she sells children’s clothing. She has a good number of customers who seek out her products and has gained valuable experience. Luz has been in retail since she was a young woman and has perfected her knowledge of the trade. She presents excellent references, both personal and work-related.

Luz is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 800 PEN. She will invest the funds in the purchase of merchandise, specifically clothing, so that she can increase her sales.

Luz is a returning client of Edpyme Alternativa. She repaid her previous loan on time.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell.

loans.name: Flor Violeta

texts.es:
En el departamento del Cusco, capital Cusco conocido desde hace muchos años como la "Capital Arqueológica de América", se reúnen cada treinta días las socias del Banco Comunal “Todos Unidos” en la oficinas central de la Asociación Arariwa, Cusco, Perú.

En este Banco Comunal conocimos a la señora Flor Violeta, tiene 36 años de edad y vive feliz con su pareja. Desde hace 12 años que Flor Violeta y su pareja Washington tienen una pequeña imprenta en un local alquilado y el local tiene como nombre particular “D’ Gráficos”. Ellos tienen cuatro personas que ayudan en el trabajo de la imprenta. Flor Violeta en el Banco Comunal tiene varios años y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos está creciendo día a día su negocio. En esta oportunidad Flor Violeta requiere el préstamo para comprar más insumos como por ejemplo papel y tintes. Su sueño de Flor Violeta es tener un su propio local y comprar una maquina offset.
texts.en:
Every thirty days the members of the communal bank "Todos Unidos" (Everyone United) meet in the central offices of the Asociación Arariwa in Cusco, Perú. The department of Cusco, whose capital is the city of Cusco, has been known for many years as the "Architectural Capital of America".

In this communal bank, we meet Flor Violeta. She is 36 years old and lives happily with her partner. For 12 years Flor Violeta and her partner, Washington, have run a small printing press in a rented shop. The shop is called "D’ Gráficos" (D' Graphics). They have four people that work in the printing shop. Flor Violeta has been a member of the communal bank for a few years and she likes it because, thanks to the loans, she is growing her business daily. This time, Flor Violeta needs the loan to purchase more inputs, such as paper and ink. Her dream is to own the shop location and to buy an offset printing machine.

loans.use: purchase more inputs, such as paper and toner.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio Cesar nació en la ciudad de Cusco y tiene 28 años. Él tiene su pareja y fruto de esta unión tiene un hijo. Actualmente, Julio Cesar vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. (Cusco denominada "Capital Arqueológica de América").   

Julio Cesar desde hace varios años que se dedica a la venta de autopartes y adornos para automóviles en el centro comercial de “Auto Partes San Pedro” de la ciudad del Cusco, él tiene un puesto de venta y  este es alquilado y su puesto de venta está equipado con la mercadería necesaria pero esta vez Julio Cesar quiere surtir un poco más.

Julio Cesar trabaja diariamente atendiendo el puesto de venta. Su esposa le ayuda con los ingresos del hogar trabajando en la casa y hay veces en el cuidado del puesto de venta. 

Julio Cesar quiere darle una buena vida a su familia aunque no tiene un puesto de venta. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Juntos Unidos” de la Asociación Arariwa donde tiene crédito por ser una persona responsable con los pagos. En esta oportunidad Julio Cesar  requiere el préstamo para compra mercadería como por ejemplo micas, direccionales, radios, parlantes, focos y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar was born in the city of Cusco and is 28 years old.  He lives with his partner and has one child.  Currently Julio Cesar lives in the beautiful city of Cusco which was named the "Archaeological Capital of America"). 

For several years, Julio Cesar has been selling car parts and decorative accessories in the "Auto Partes San Pedro" shopping center, in the city of Cusco.  He rents a sales location which is equipped with the merchandise he needs but he would like to stock it with a little more merchandise.

Julio Cesar works every day in his business.  His wife helps him with the household income by working at home and sometimes looking after the store.

Julio Cesar would like to provide his family with a good life even though he doesn't own a sales location.  He is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Juntos Unidos" community bank where he is known as a person who is responsible in making his repayments.  On this occasion, Julio Cesar needs a loan to buy merchandise such as decals, turn signals (indicators), radios, speakers, headlamps, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as decals, turn signals (indicators), radios, speakers, headlamps, etc.

loans.name: Michel

texts.es:
la sra. Michel tiene 55 años de edad, vive en la colonia Bello Horizonte en el Triunfo Choluteca y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion.
doña Michel tiene 2 hijos los cuales ya estan casados y viven con sus familias, Michel vive solo con su esposo, se turnan para atender a los clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia al por mayor para surtir su negocio.
sus tiempos libres lo dedica a visitar la iglesia.
texts.en:
Michel is 55 years old and lives in Bello Horizonte neighborhood, in El Triunfo, Choluteca.  She sells essential household products in her grocery store which is located in her home.

Michel has two children who are already married and live with their families.  Michel lives alone with her husband.  They take turns serving their customers in the store.  Michel will use her loan to buy merchandise wholesale with which she will stock her business.

In her spare time, Michel goes to church.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, butter, toilet paper, candles, matches, coffee, bread, juice, churros, salt and seasonings.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis nació en la ciudad de Puno  y tiene 38 años. Él es casado y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, José Luis vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco (Cusco denominada "Capital Arqueológica de América").   

José Luis desde hace 12 años que se dedica a la venta de autopartes y adornos para automóviles en el centro comercial de “Auto Partes San Pedro”, él tiene un puesto de venta alquilado y está equipado con la mercadería necesaria pero esta vez quiere surtir un poco más.

José Luis trabaja diariamente atendiendo el puesto de venta. Su esposa le ayuda con los ingresos del hogar trabajando en la casa y hay veces en el cuidado del puesto de venta. 

José Luis quiere darle una buena vida a su familia aunque no tiene un puesto de venta propia porque lo primero que quiere es educar a sus hijos. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Juntos Unidos” de la Asociación Arariwa donde tiene crédito por ser una persona responsable con los pagos. En esta oportunidad José Luis requiere el préstamo para compra mercadería como por ejemplo adornos para automoviles.
texts.en:
José Luis was born in the city of Puno and is 38 years old.  He is married and has two children.  Currently José Luis lives in the beautiful city of Cusco which was named the "Archaeological Capital of America".

For 12 years, José Luis has been selling car parts and decorative accessories for vehicles, in the "Auto Partes San Pedro" shopping center.  He rents a sales location which is equipped with the merchandise he needs.  However, he would like to stock his business a little more.

José Luis works in his business every day.  His wife helps him with the household income by working at home and sometimes helping take care of the store.

José Luis would like to provide his family with a good life even though he does not own his own sales location.  His main priority is educating his children.  He belongs to Asociación Arariwa's "Juntos Unidos" community bank and is noted for being responsible in making his repayments.  On this occasion, José Luis needs a loan to buy merchandise such as decorative accessories for vehicles.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as decorative accessories for vehicles

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andrés es un padre de familia de 39 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos  en el distrito de Jayanca en Lambayeque. Los vecinos de Andrés consideran que en su hogar predomina la unión familiar y que Andrés es un hombre que lucha por el bienestar de sus niños y esposa.

Andrés trabaja desde hace un año, para una empresa exportadora de frutas y verduras, él tiene un cargo como operario de campo. Sin embargo, Andrés tiene muchos deseos de comenzar su negocio propio y es por eso que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar una mototaxi (moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros). 

Andrés tiene muchos deseos de superación y sabe que brindando el servicio de mototaxi podrá generar más ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Andrés is a 39-year-old father who lives with his wife and children in the District of Jayanca in Lambayeque. His neighbors say that his family is very important to him. Andrés strives to provide for the welfare of his wife and children.

For the past year, Andrés has worked for a company that exports fruits and vegetables. His job is that of a field operator. However, he is very eager to start his own business. For this reason, Andrés has requested a loan of 1500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can buy a motorcycle taxi (a motorcycle with an attached cabin in the rear for transporting passengers).

Andrés has tremendous desire to succeed and possesses the knowledge of how to provide motorcycle taxi services so that he can generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Jimena Vicenta

texts.es:
Jimena nació en la ciudad de Cusco y tiene 19 años. Ella tiene su pareja y fruto de esta unión tiene un hijo. Actualmente, Jimena vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. (Cusco denominada "Capital Arqueológica de América").   

Jimena y su esposo Julio Cesar desde hace varios años que se dedican a la venta de autopartes y adornos para automóviles en el centro comercial de “Auto Partes San Pedro” de la ciudad del Cusco, ellos tiene un puesto de venta alquilado y el puesto de venta está equipado con poca mercadería. Jimena es ama de casa pero también ayuda a su esposo atendiendo el puesto de venta. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Juntos Unidos” de la Asociación Arariwa donde tiene crédito porque es una persona responsable con los pagos. En esta oportunidad Jimena requiere el préstamo para compra mercadería como por ejemplo micas, direccionales, radios, parlantes, focos y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Jimena was born in the city of Cusco and is 19 years old.  She lives with her partner and has one child.  Currently Jimena lives in the beautiful city of Cusco which was named the "Archaeological Capital of America".

For several years, Jimena and her husband Julio Cesar have been selling car parts and decorative accessories for vehicles in the "Auto Partes San Pedro" shopping center, in the city of Cusco.  They rent a sales location which is stocked with not much merchandise.  Jimena is a housewife but she also helps her husband to serve in the business.  She is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Juntos Unidos" community bank where she is noted as a person who is responsible in making her repayments.  On this occasion, Jimena needs a loan to buy merchandise such as decals, turn signals (indicators), radios, speakers, headlamps, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as decals, turn signals (indicators), radios, speakers, headlamps, etc.

loans.name: Miladis Sofia

texts.es: Miladis vive en el barrio Villa del Carmen, en compañía de su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 13 y 23 años con quienes sueña verlos como profesionales exitosos en el futuro y esta es su principal motivación. Miladis siempre interesada en progresar y apoyar a su familia, se ha dedicado al trabajo independiente a través del cual comercializa con carne de res, de cerdo  y gallinas criollas, aunque tambien  vende mercancía  variada desde hace mucho tiempo, lo cual ha fortalecido su espíritu independiente, pues nunca se ha imaginado trabajado 8 horas como empleada, porque le satisface disponer de su propio tiempo y como ella dice: “así le rinde mucho más”. Mediante su negocio de mercancía distribuye a crédito cosméticos, talcos, desodorantes y artículos de uso personal, entre su  clientela del  barrio y en los alrededores, principal mercado  objetivo de Miladis;  sus ingreso dependen de la venta de estos productos  y de la venta de contado de carne de res,  cerdo y gallinas criollas.   Su sueño es ampliar su capital de trabajo, porque cuenta con muy poco, por eso son muchas las veces en las cuales no responde oportunamente a los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes. En la actualidad está en la búsqueda de este propósito y se ha acercado a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para obtener su credikiva, primer financiamiento con el cual comprará mercancía cosmética y carnes de res, cerdo y gallina criolla, pues su rentabilidad con la venta de estos productos es no menor de un 40% y con mayor capital logrará mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Miladis lives in Villa del Carmen neighborhood, together with her husband and her two children aged 13 and 23.  She dreams of seeing her children become successful professionals in the future and this is her main motivation.

Miladis is always interested in making progress and supporting her family.  She is self employed and sells beef, pork and creole chicken.  She has also been selling a variety of merchandise for years.  This has strengthened her independent spirit.  She has never imagined herself working 8 hours a day as an employee because she enjoys making use of her own time and, as she says, "you are more productive this way".

Miladis sells cosmetics, talcum powder, deodorants and other personal use products on credit to customers in her neighborhood and surrounding areas.  Her income depends on the sale of these products and on her sales of beef, pork and creole chicken (which she sells for cash).

Miladis' dream is to expand her working capital because she has very little.  This means that she is often unable to respond in a timely fashion to the orders that her customers place with her.  She is currently looking to achieve this goal and so approached Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to obtain a Kiva loan.  This is Miladis' first loan and she will use it to buy cosmetics, beef, pork and creole chicken.  Her profitability on her sales of these products is not less than 40%.  With more capital, she will manage to make better profits.

loans.use: to buy beef, pork, creole chicken and cosmetics

loans.name: Maria Trinidad

texts.es:
María Trinidad es madre trabajadora de 30  años de edad esta casada y  vive en casa propia con 4 hijos que dependen de ella y su esposo. Ellos viven en el caserío Monte Grande (comunidad rural de condición baja y en pleno desarrollo), ubicado a 5 minutos de la ciudad de Mórrope en Lambayeque.

María Trinidad se dedica a la venta de pan, el cual elabora (artesanalmente) y  comercializa todas las tardes en la ciudad de Mórrope. Maria Trinidad vende el pan en el centro de la ciudad y cuenta con una clientela establecida.  Su esposo también se dedica a la venta de panes.

María Trinidad solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra de insumos como manteca y harina, para la elaboración de sus panes. Puesto que su demanda ha aumentado.

María Trinidad y su esposo tienen muchos deseos de superación y esperan algún día abrir su propia panadería.
texts.en:
Maria Trinidad is a hardworking mother.  She is 30 years old, married, and lives in her own home with her four dependent children and her husband.  They reside in the village of Monte Grande, a rural lower-class community that is in a development stage, which is located five minutes away from the city of Mórrope in Lambayeque.  

Maria Trinidad sells bread that she prepares by hand.  She sells her products every afternoon in the city of Mórrope.  Maria Trinidad sells her bread in the central part of the city and has an established customer base.  Her husband is also responsible for selling the bread.  

Maria Trinidad is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN.  The funds will be used to buy supplies, such as butter and flour, for making her bread.  The demand for her goods has increased.

Maria Trinidad and her husband have tremendous desire to succeed and hope to open their own bakery some day.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for baking.

loans.name: Claudia Lucedy

texts.es:
Claudia tiene una tienda de variedades hace aproximadamente 7 años, actualmente ubicada en el barrio La Pradera en Medellín Antioquia, sin embargo durante este tiempo ha desplazado su tienda por 4 barrios diferentes de la ciudad por problemas de orden público. Y aunque en el local donde actualmente se encuentra hay algunos problemas en el barrio, está más tranquila y su familia mucho más segura.

 

Su negocio es reconocido en el barrio por tener gran variedad de productos que son necesarios en la canasta familiar, por tal motivo Claudia debe surtir frecuentemente, y aunque sus ventas sean buenas las utilidades no superan sus expectativas por lo que ella quiere realizar un surtido grande que le permita generar mayores ganancias, igualmente necesita cambiar una de las vitrinas que se encuentra en mal estado y es peligroso para su salud ya que podría generar un accidente. Sin embargo Claudia no cuenta con el dinero para realizar estas compras, por lo que solicita un préstamo que cubra con esta necesidad que hoy en día se le presenta.

 

Claudia sueña con una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Claudia has had a variety store for approximately seven years. It is currently located in the La Pradera neighborhood of Medellín, which is within the Department of Antioquia. However, for public safety reasons, she has relocated her store to four different neighborhoods during this time. Although there are some problems in the current neighborhood, she is more at ease and her family is much safer.

Her business is known in the neighborhood for having a large variety of products for the household. As a result, Claudia must stock her store frequently and although her sales are good, they do not meet her expectations. This is why she wants to make a large purchase to stock her store and generate higher profits. She also needs to replace one of the display cases, as it is in poor condition and is dangerous and could cause an accident. However, Claudia does not have the money to make these purchases, which is why she is requesting this loan to cover her current need.

Claudia dreams of having a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products and a display case for them.

loans.name: Sergey

texts.en:
Sergey G. was born in 1980. He is married and has a daughter who is two years old. Sergey works at Syunik village administration and his wife works at the kindergarten in the same village. 

Sergey combines his work in village administration with farming, which helps him to support his young family. Sergey has run his farm for over 10 years and he likes his occupation very much. On his farm he breeds cows, calves and chickens. Sergey is also engaged in beekeeping. 

Sergey is asking for an 800.000 Armenian drams loan to buy a cow, fodder for his farm animals and to buy wax papers for his bees. He has already received loans from Nor Horizon 4 times previously and he has never delayed his repayments.

loans.use: To buy a cow, fodder for his farm animals and to buy wax papers for his bees.

loans.name: Jesus Manuel

texts.es:
Jesús es un cliente de 39 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa en  la parte rural del distrito de Olmos en Lambayeque. Jesús es conocido en la zona por ser una persona alegre, honrada y muy trabajadora.

La actividad a la que Jesús se dedica es la venta de abarrotes y golosinas en un puesto fijo ubicado en los interiores de su hogar. Además de vender abarrotes y golosinas Jesús vende prendas de vestir.

La tienda de Jesús es una de las más surtidas en su localidad  y él espera seguir creciendo en su negocio. Es por eso que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de  2000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de productos para su bodega (abarrotes y golosinas) y esto le permitirá seguir surtiéndola y aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida.

La meta de Jesús es tener la tienda más grande de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Jesús is a 39-year-old client who lives with his wife in their own home located in the rural section of the District of Olmos in Lambayeque. He is known in the area for being a cheerful, honest, and hardworking individual.

Jesús sells groceries and candy from an established location inside of his house. In addition to groceries and candy, Jesús sells clothing.

His store is one of the best-stocked in his community and he hopes to continue growing his business. For this reason, Jesús has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN to invest in the purchase of products for his store, such as groceries and candy. This will enable him to restock his store and increase his earnings so that he can improve his quality of life.

His goal is to have the largest store in his community.

loans.use: to purchase groceries and candy for his store.

loans.name: Dora Leticia

texts.es: Dora Leticia: Ella es dueña de una tienda en la aldea donde ella vive nos cuenta que con su esfuerzo ha podido sacar adelante s sus hijos ella es madre soltera ella nos cuenta que nececita este credito para la compra de productos comestibles de primera nececidad y asi poder surtir mas su tienda y tener mas bariedad para ofrecerles a sus clentes y de la misma manera obtener mejores ganancias para seguir ayudando a sus hijos en la educacion su sueño es que sus hijos sean unos profecionales en un futuro.
texts.en:
Dora Leticia owns a store in the neighborhood where she lives.  She says that through her efforts, she has been able to move her children forward.  Dora is a single mother and needs this loan to buy basic food products.  This will allow her to restock her store and be able to offer more variety to her customers.  As a result, she will generate more income to continue helping her children with their education.  

Her dream is for her children to become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to purchase basic food products.

loans.name: Maritzabel

texts.es: Maritzabel Monge Solís, tiene la edad de 25 años, está en unión libre  y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar los insumos necesarios para su excelente producción. Ella cuenta con la propiedad a su posesión y esta plantada, lo que pretende invertir con los insumos para tener una mejor calidad de cosecho y cantidad. Ella quiere crecer como caficultora de la zona y genera los ingresos de su familia para un bienestar más estable. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Maritzabel Monge Solis is 25 years old.  She has a common-law husband and lives with him and their two children.  With the loan, she plans to purchase the necessary supplies for her excellent harvest.  The land is in her possession and is planted, which is why she plans to invest in supplies to have a better harvest in both quality and quantity.  She wants to grow as a coffee grower in the area and earn income for her family in order to have a more stable well-being.  This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR.  She has not had any previous loans with national banks, but FUDECOSUR has granted her the loan more easily and with lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy supplies for coffee growing.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un cliente de 38 años de edad, vive en casa de familiares junto a su esposa y su pequeña hija. Ellos viven en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz – Chiclayo. Esta es una comunidad urbana en vías de crecimiento.

Francisco se dedica a los servicios de transporte público, él  posee una mototaxi (moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros) que le permite obtener ingresos diarios.

Adicionalmente Francisco se dedica a la elaboración y venta de cocinas de arcilla. Él vende sus productos de manera ambulatoria y cuenta con 8 años de experiencia en este rubro. La esposa de Francisco lo ayuda a administrar  su negocio y esta unión ha permitido que el negocio de Francisco crezca. 

Francisco solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que invertirá en el mantenimiento de su moto así como la regularización de los documentos de esta. Otra parte del crédito será destinada al a compra de materiales para preparar sus cocinas de barro.

Francisco es un hombre trabajador con muchos deseos de superación.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 38-year-old client. He lives with his wife and young daughter in the home of relatives. They reside in the District of José Leonardo Ortiz – Chiclayo, an urban community that is in the growth process.

Francisco provides public transportation services. He owns a motorcycle taxi (a motorcycle with an attached cabin in the rear for transporting passengers) that helps him generate a daily income.

In addition, Francisco makes and sells clay stoves. He sells these products as a street vendor and has eight years of experience in this trade. His wife helps manage their business and their partnership has enabled Francisco’s transportation business to grow.

He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN. The funds will be invested in the maintenance of his motorcycle taxi and the renewal of his vehicle papers. Part of the loan will also be used to buy materials for making clay stoves.

Francisco is a hardworking gentleman who has tremendous desire to succeed.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of his motorcycle taxi, update his vehicle papers, and purchase materials for making clay stoves.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products to stock her store.

loans.name: Evelyn Hortencia

texts.es: Evelyn: es D. 36 años D. edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos ella es dueña D. una tinda donD. venD. productos D. cosmeticos,como perfumeria cremas para damas etc. que esta ubicada en la aldea donD. ella vive desD. hace 17 años ademas hace trabajos D. belleza a domicilio ella nos cuenta que nececita este credito para la compra D. cosmeticos y asi agrandar su negocio su deseo es sacar adelante s sus hijos que estan estudiando.
texts.en: Evelyn, 36, is married and has two children.  She owns a store where she sells cosmetics such as perfumes and ladies' creams.  It is located in the village where she has lived for 17 years.  She also provides door-to-door beauty services and says she needs a loan to buy cosmetics so she can expand her business.  Her goal is to help her children get ahead.  They are now in school.

loans.use: To buy a variety of cosmetics.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es: Liz tiene 22 años, vive en compañía de su esposo y su hija en casa de sus padres. Desde hace 2 años se dedica a la elaboración de fustán aplicando bordados y con diseños típicos de su zona. Su esposo la apoya en esta actividad, es así que ambos trabajan día y noche bordando y cosiendo en su única herramienta de trabajo que es una maquina de coser. Una vez realizado estas prendas, los lleva cada fin de semana a venderlos en las diversas ferias comerciales de las zonas rurales, pues es ahí donde recibe mayor ganancia. La elaboración de su falda considera que son rentables porque  es un producto que tiene mucha demanda  por lo que su deseo es mejorar sus herramientas y aumentar su producción. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP,  es relativamente nueva en su banco comunal y en este corto tiempo ha tenido buenos aprendizajes que le han servido en su vida diaria de la cual esta agradecida  y renueva su compromiso de ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de telas y conos de hilos.
texts.en: Liz is 22 years old and lives with her husband and daughter at her parents’ house.  For the past two years, she has worked making skirts using embroidery and designs typical of her area.  Her husband supports her in this business, so they both work day and night embroidering and sewing using their only work tool – a sewing machine.  Once the items are made, she brings them each weekend to the different rural area markets to sell, as this is where she earns the highest profit.  She considers skirt-making to be profitable because there is a great deal of demand for the product.  As a result, she wants to have better tools and increase her production.  This is her second loan with MFP.  She is relatively new in her communal bank and in this short time, she has learned good lessons that have helped her in her daily life.  This is why she is grateful and renews her promise to make her repayments on time.  With the loan requested, she will invest in the purchase of fabric and spools of thread.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and spools of thread of different colors.

loans.name: Yuliza Yanina

texts.es:
Yuliza  es una madre de familia de 31 años de edad, ella vive junto a su esposo e  hijos en el distrito Picsi – Chiclayo. La comunidad donde residen es una comunidad urbana y  grande, la cual cuenta con los servicios básicos de agua y luz eléctrica.  

El esposo de Yuliza labora para una empresa privada, cortando caña de azúcar. Mientras que Yuliza se dedica a la venta de cerámica en frío,  actividad que viene ejerciendo desde hace más de 5 años en forma continua.

Yuliza elabora sus productos de cerámica en su vivienda y luego se los vende a un señor que es el más grande proveedor de productos de cerámica en frío del mercado Modelo (el más popular de la ciudad de Chiclayo). La demanda del señor ha aumentado  y este le ha solicitada a Yuliza más productos. Es por eso que ella pide un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de  1500 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra de materiales de trabajo.

Yuliza es una persona con deseos de superación que tiene pensado en ser una gran distribuidora de productos en cerámica en el distrito de Picsi.
texts.en:
Yuliza, age 31, lives with her husband and children in the district of Picsi - Chiclayo, a large urban community which has basic utilities such as running water and electricity.

Her husband works for a private company cutting sugar cane.  Meanwhile Yuliza sells ceramics, a trade in which she has been involved for over five years on a continuous basis.

Yuliza makes ceramic products in her home and later sells them to a representative of a larger ceramic plaster products supplier at the Modelo Market (the most popular in the city of Chiclayo).  The representative's demand has increased and he is ordering more products from Yuliza.  She has requested a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy work materials.

Yuliza is intent on making a better life for herself and wants to become a great ceramic products distributor in the district of Picsi.

loans.use: To buy ceramic plaster to make products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothing items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries to sell in her store

loans.name: Sanjuana

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Sanjuana le esta haciendo faltas las protecciones de la ventanas y puertas. 
Solicita un préstamo para poder pagare a la persona que se encargara de elaborar las protecciones de herrería y colocarlas en su casa. Desea que el patrimonio de su familia este protegido y seguro. 
Pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo como empleada de una agencia aduanal.
texts.en:
Sanjuana’s home lacks protection for the windows and doors.
She is requesting a loan to be able to pay the person who will be in charge of making the metalwork and placing it in the house.  She hopes that the belongings of her family will be protected and safe.
She will pay back the loan with the salary she receives in her work as an employee in a customs agency.

loans.use: to place protections in the windows and doors in her house.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 44 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y humilde, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo José de 45 años y sus 2 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Cada día Ana trabaja muy duro para salir adelante, es por eso que se dedica a varios oficios a la vez, ahora se esta dedicando a  la venta de productos de belleza. Ella vende a sus clientes ya conocidos, quienes difícilmente se atrasaran en el pago, adicionalmente presta el servicio de cosmetología a sus conocidos, quienes saben de la habilidad que tiene en sus manos para cortar el cabello y hacer peinados. Hace algunos años estudio cosmetología, pero no se dedicó por completo a esta labor pues sus hijos estaban pequeños, pero en la actualidad quiere trabajar con mayor esfuerzo en este oficio. Le gusta mucho su labor como peluquera pues se entretiene y le genera regulares ganancias, también brinda el servicio de cosmetología a domicilio, lo que marca la diferencia. Aunque no tiene  aún su propio salón de belleza tiene planeado para el futuro instalar uno en sociedad con una amiga. Es el segundo crédito con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible que pudiera obtener este crédito. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará algunos materiales que necesita para continuar peinando, además de tintes y líquidos para desarrollar mejor su labor.
texts.en: Ana, 44 years old, is a simple and humble woman.  She lives in her house with her husband Jose, 45 years old, and her 2 beloved children for whom she wants to bring a better quality of life.  Ana works very hard every day to get ahead, for that reason she works at several activities at the same time.  She is currently working at selling beauty products.  She sells to her current customers who are unlikely to get behind in their payments.  She also provides cosmetology services to her acquaintances who know her skills in cutting and styling hair.  She studied cosmetology several years ago but did not work at it full time because her children were small, currently she wants to devote more time to the trade.  She loves her role as a beautician because she finds it entertaining and it generated steady income. She also provides cosmetology services in the customers' homes which makes her unique.  Even though she does not yet have her own shop, she plans to open one with a friend as a partner.  This is her second loan with MFP and she promises to pay her installments on a timely fashion because she does not want to look bad to the people that made this loan possible.  With the thousand new soles that she is requesting she will buy supplies that she needs to continue doing hair, in addition to color and lotions to better develop her trade.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as hair color, hair dryer, combs and brushes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy grocery products for sale.

loans.name: Hortencia

texts.es: Hortencia, D. 69 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es trabajar muy duro para tener una vejez tranquila. DesD. muy joven, Hortencia supo lo que quería hacer para ganarse en la vida, desD. entonces incursionó en el negocio D. venta D. artesanías D. cuero remojado, las cuales elabora con sus propias manos, para luego llevarlas a vender por los principales mercados D. la ciudad D. Lima, que es donD. tiene más venta. Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es participar D. las distintas ferias que se llevan a cabo en la ciudad, lleva 42 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos a los puntos D. ventas, por se estructuras muy delicadas y corren el riesgo D. cuartearse o romperse. Con el tiempo, espera poner una tienda muy granD. D. artesanías, donD. pueda vender con mayor comodidad. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo y esta dispuesta a hacerlo, en su banco comunal es una socia muy querida. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará materiales para elaborar sus preciadas artesanías D. cuero remojado.
texts.en: Hortencia, 69 years old, is a lovable and hard working woman.  She lives in her own house and wishes to be able to work very hard and have a peaceful old age.  From the time that she was young, Hortencia knew what she wanted to do to make a living.  Since then she embarked on the business of selling crafts from soaked leather, which she makes herself and the takes to the main markets in Lima for sale.  What she likes the most about her work is participating in the various fairs that occur in the city.  She has been in this business for 42 years and finds the transport of her products to be the most difficult part, for they are delicate and run the risk of splitting or breaking.  In time, she hopes to open a large crafts store where she can sell in more comfort.  This is her third loan with MFP, she know that she needs to pay her installments on time and plans to do so.  She is a loved member of her community bank.  With the 1,500 new soles she will buy materials to make her precious leather crafts.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make soaked leather crafts.

loans.name: Fanny

texts.es:
Fanny es una cliente conocida de Edpyme Alternativa. Ella tiene 50 años de edad y vive en casa de sus padres en un caserío (comunidad rural de condición baja y en pleno desarrollo) ubicado a 8 km. Del distrito de Tambogrande – Piura.

Fanny se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, cuenta con clientela conocida y recorre su caserío y aledaños ofreciendo sus productos. Así mismo  Fanny recibe el apoyo de sus padres quienes le ceden unas plantas de limón que cosecha quincenalmente y vende en el mercado local. Fanny es una persona con muchos deseos de superación.   

Fanny solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra de cosméticos en oferta para ventas directas y en la compra de fertilizantes para las plantaciones de limón con las que cuenta.
texts.en:
Fanny is a member of Edpyme Alternativa; she is 50 years old and lives with her parents in a caserio (a rural community still in the process of development) located 8 kilometers away from the district of Tambogrande, Piura.

Fanny works selling beauty products through catalogs; she has a lot of loyal clients and she goes out in her community and nearby areas offering her products. Fanny receives support from her parents, who have given her several lime plants that she harvests every two weeks to sell the fruits in the local market. She is a person with a strong drive to overcome difficulties and adversity.

Fanny is applying for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which she will use to buy discounted cosmetics to sell and fertilizers for her lime plants.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and fertilizer for lime plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction material for improvements to his home.

loans.name: Belén

texts.es:
La señora Belén tiene ya más de cinco años dedicándose a la venta de productos para belleza para dama.
A su negocio le esta haciendo falta más productos ya que tiene varios pedidos para entregar y no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la compra.
Es por es que esta solicitando un préstamo para poder realizar el pedido y así entregar los encargo a tiempo y que sus clientas no se molestan y le sigan comprando sus productos. 
Pagara el crédito con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio, ya que los gastos familiares se encargara su esposo el señor Abel con el sueldo que recibe como empleado de una compañía de seguridad.
texts.en:
Mrs. Belen has been selling beauty products for women for more than five years.
She needs more products for her business.  She has various orders to fulfill and does not have the money to purchase the products.
The reason for her loan request is to be able to make the purchase and fill the order on time so that her customers are not inconvenienced and continue to buy from her.
She will repay the loan with the income from her business. since her husband, Abel,  covers the household expenses with the salary that he gets as an employee of a security company.

loans.use: to invest in products for her business.

loans.name: Mougnal Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Mougnal est créé le 12 octobre 2010. Il compte 05 membres qui sont très solidaires. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Maoundé âgée de 65 ans (debout à l’extrême droit) est responsable du groupe. Elle  est mariée et a deux petits fils en charge.

Elle vend des fruits et légumes au marché hebdomadaire de sa localité. Elle a une bonne expérience de cette activité pour l’avoir pratiqué pendant plus de six ans.

Avec son nouveau prêt elle compte acheter des mangues pour la revente au marché.

Les bénéfices de cette activité lui permettront d’aider son mari dans la prise en charge des frais alimentaires et scolaires de ses petits enfants.
texts.en:
The Mougnal Group was created at the inception of the Village Bank of Dialicounda Kawral on October 12, 2010.  It consists of five members who are very close.  Their main business is petty trading.  

Madame Maoundé (at the far right) is 65 years old and in charge of the group.  She is married with two children.  She sells fruits and vegetables at the Diaobé Market.  Having practiced this trade for more than six years, she is very experienced.  With her new loan she intends to purchase mangoes in order to resell them at market.  

The profits from this business will allow her to assist her husband in managing the household expenses and school fees of her small children.

loans.use: to buy mangoes in order to resell them at market.

loans.name: Juana Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Juana tiene su propio negocio, el cual inicio hace trece años, una pulpería que ha venido creciendo tras estos últimos años, comenzando con pequeñas venta de leña y nacatamales. 
Al proyectarse con financiamiento en Afodenic, logra poner una pulpería la cual ha venido trabajando, durante once ciclos de los cuales han sido para el desarrollo de su negocio al comprar más productos para ofertar a sus clientes.
Con este nuevo préstamo, comprara granos básicos como: tres quintales de arroz, cuatro quintales de azúcar, seis cajas de jabón marfil, tres bidón de aceite, gaseosas, golosinas que ayuden a mantener el equilibrio de las ventas como  mejores ganancias que ayude a pagar sus gastos básicos entre otros gastos.
texts.en:
Juana has her own business which she started three years ago, a general store that has been growing for the last few years, which she started by selling firewood and nacaramales (steamed corn cakes).
With planning and financing from Afodenic, she was able to open a general store at which she has been working through twelve cycles, developing her business through the purchase of more products to offer to her customers.
With this new loan she will buy basic grains such as three hundredweights of rice, four hundredweights of sugar, six cases of soap, three drums of oil, sodas, candies, that will help to maintain the balance of the sales through better profits that will help to pay her basic and other expenses.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of basic grain products to achieve better sales.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.es: Milagros, de 38 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Julio de 39 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Milagros tiene una pequeña librería en el distrito de Ventanilla en Lima, ella vende cuadernos, lapiceros, plumones, etc., ahora se encuentra vendiendo lo último en útiles escolares, ya que quiere aprovechar la gran demanda que existe en estos meses por parte de los alumnos de escuelas y colegios, cercanos a su negocio. Para ella los más difícil de su trabajo es saber que producto se venderá más, aun así disfruta mucho de ofrecer a sus clientes las cosas que tiene en su librería, tiene ya 6 años en esta actividad y anhela ver crecer su librería y que se vuelva la principal de su barrio, ya que así podrá mejorar sus ingresos económicos y cambiar su vida para bien. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, ella ha pagado puntualmente su anterior crédito y este último espera pagarlo a tiempo también. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, planea implementar mejor su librería, para así tener más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes.
texts.en: Milagros is 38-years-old and a very pleasant and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house along with her husband Julio who is 39-years-old and their four beloved children who they want to offer a better quality of life.  Milagros has a small bookshop in the Ventanilla district in Lima.  She sells notebooks, pens, markers, etc.  Now she is selling the latest in school supplies as she wants to take advantage of the big demand right now from students in schools near her business.  For her, the most difficult part of her business is knowing which products will sell best, even with this, she greatly enjoys offering customers the things that she has in her shop.  She has been working at this for six years and hopes to see her bookshop grow and become the main one in the neighborhood as in this way she can improve her income and change her life for the better.  It is her second loan with MFP.  She paid off her previous loan punctually and hopes to pay this latest one on time too.  With the 2000 nuevos soles that she requested she plans to implement improvements in her bookshop to have more products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy school and office supplies to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a bathroom and kitchen

loans.name: Cristo La Solucion 1, 5 & 7 Group

texts.en:
Sonia is the coordinator of her group, Cristo L. Solucion (Christ the Soluction)1, 5 & 7. Her group is located in the areas surrounding L. Romana, an area economically dominated by the sugarcane harvest. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long term partner and their 7 children.

Sonia is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza, after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business. She runs a beauty salon and a miscellaneous store. She will buy some products, such as beauty and cosmetic products, clothes, accessories and many other items for both economic activities. She will use the profits to save and reinvest in her business.

She said that her most difficult challenge has been to start her business, after she had learned how to work as a beautician. Her dream is to have an improved general store. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy beauty products, cosmetics, clothes, accessories, etc.

loans.name: Olga Lidia

texts.es: La  señora Olga Lidia E. E. de 32 años de edad es casada tiene una hija de 7 años de edad , ella se dedica a confeccionar  blusas típicas y tiene una venta de ropa  típica. Hace tres años su esposo regreso de los estados unidos  porque se enfermo y no pudo seguir trabajando más , entonces viendo la necesidad de poder trabajar decidieron abrir un negocio y pensaron en una agroquímica ya que en este pueblo la mayoría de familias se dedican al cultivo entonces se dieron cuenta de que este negocio si es rentable , y decidieron utilizar un ahorro que tenían para iniciar pero necesitan otro  poco de capital para que  puedan tener todo lo que sus clientes necesitan   por esa razón decidieron  solicitar este credito para la compra de productos quimicos para la agricultura  su sueño es poder agrandar mas su negocio para tener un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Mrs. Olga Lidia E. E. is 32 years old and married with a seven-year-old daughter. She works creating blouses and selling clothing. Three years ago, Olga's husband returned from the United States because he fell ill and was unable to continue working; seeing the need to work, they decided to open a business, and they decided on selling agrochemicals because in their town, the majority of the families work in agriculture, so the business would be viable. The couple decided to use some savings to begin the business, but they need a little more capital to offer all that their clients need. For this reason, they decided to apply for this loan to buy chemical products for agriculture. Olga's dream is to be able to expand her business to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural chemicals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials for housing improvements

loans.name: Fernando Antonio

texts.es: EL SEÑOR FERNANDO LABORA COMO COLECTOR, ES ACOMPAÑADO, TIENE CUATRO  PERSONA A SU CARGO, ES EL SEPTIMO CREDITO QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, LO NECESITA PARA INVERTIRLO EN MEJORA DE SU VIVIENDA EN CONSTRUIR UN ANEXO PARA LA COCINA, EN COMPRA DE ARENA, BLOQUE, CEMENTO, HIERRO, ESTRIBO, EL PAGO DE LA MANO DE OBRA, AGRADECE EL APOYO QUE  ESTA INSTITUCION LE BRINDA.
texts.en: Mr. Fernando works as a collector, is accompanied and in charge of four people. This is the seventh loan that CEPRODEL offers him. He needs it to improve his home by building an attachment to his kitchen therefore will need to buy sand, cement, iron, buttresses, and pay for manual work. He is thankful for the support being offered by the institution.

loans.use: buy sand, cement, iron, buttresses, and pay for manual work for house improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make housing improvements

loans.name: Axiel De Fátima

texts.es: LA SEÑORA MEDRANO LABORA COMO SECRETARIA EJECUTIVA, ES SOLTERA, ES EL QUINTO CREDITO QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA,LO NECESITA PARA INVERTIRLO EN MEJORA DE SU VIVIENDA EN REALIZAR UN ANEXO DE UN CUARTO, EN COMPRA DE ARENA, BLOQUE, CEMENTO, HIERRO,ESTRIBO, EL PAGO DE LA MANO DE OBRA.
texts.en: Señora Medrano works as an executive secretary. She is single. This is her fifth loan with Kiva partner Ceprodel, and she plans to use it to improve her house. She wants to add on an extra room so needs to buy sand, cement blocks, rebar, supports and hire someone to do the work.

loans.use: Mejoras de vivienda, compra de materiales de construcción.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plants, groceries, and additional varied merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room downstairs at her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Janett Del Socorro

texts.es: Janett del Socorro es una mujer muy abnegada que siempre está buscando el medio de generar ingresos a su hogar. Se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdo. Es una persona muy responsable, esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues es por medio de ellos que ha podido salir adelante. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de cerdos.  Ella sueña con agrandar su negocio cada día mas, por lo que disfruta de ofrecer un gran servicio.
texts.en:
Janett del Socorro is a selfless woman who is always seeking ways to generate household funds.  She is a pig merchant.  She’s a very responsible person and this isn’t her first loan because loans have helped her get ahead.

The loan she’s asking for is to buy pigs.  She dreams with enlarging her business more each day because she enjoys providing great service.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Dios Provee 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Nery is the coordinator of her group, Dios Provee 1 & 2. She lives in the city of La Romana, where the sugar cane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. 

Nery has been working for almost one year. She started her business with her first Esperanza loan, after the program went to her community and some neighbors joined. She had sold animals for a long time, helping her husband. Now Nery has her own business selling goats. She buys them as infants and raises them. She also buys adult goats to sell the meat. Nery is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase a dozen goats.

Nery lives with her two children and their father. Her most difficult challenges are to have an improved business, enough money to buy a car, and to reinvest in her business for a prosperous living. Thank you for your support!.

loans.use: to buy goats

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La Sra. Isabel pertenece al Banco Comunal “Las Margaritas II” del Distrito de La Banda de Shilcayo, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Está casada y tiene 49 años.  Tiene cinco  hijas, cuatro de ellas mayores de edad y con familias independientes, sola la menor de 16 años vive con ella. 

La Sra. Isabel motivada por su vecina hace tres años se inició en el negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas y agua mineral.  Su préstamo inicial fue de S/200.00 nuevos soles, con el que compró unos cuantos paquetes  de bebidas, actualmente su clientela ha aumentado y sus ventas son por botellas individuales y por cajas.  

Con este préstamo de S/. 2000.00  comprará  gaseosas de diferentes sabores  y tamaños , agua mineral con gas y sin  gas y jugos embasados en paquetes para continuar dando una mejor atención y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.  

Isabel es una mujer luchadora, se siente muy animada a continuar trabajando y ampliar su negocio pero a la  vez crear aperturar una tienda de abarrotes más adelante  es por esta razón que está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Isabel belongs to Las Margaritas II Communal Bank, La Banda district of Chiclayo, province and department of San Martin.  She is 49 years old and married.  She has five daughters, four of them grown with their own families.  Only the youngest (16 years old) lives with her.

Encouraged by her neighbor three years ago, Isabel set up a business to sell carbonated drinks and mineral water.  Her first loan was 200.00 new soles, which she used to buy cartons of drinks.  Her customer base has grown, and sales are now by the bottle or box.

With this 2,000-sol loan, she will buy various sizes and flavors of carbonated drinks, mineral water (carbonated and non-carbonated), and juice packaged in boxes, in order to continue to provide better service to her customers and respond to their needs.

Isabel is a woman who strives to succeed, and she feels enthusiastic at continuing to work and expand her business, but also to set up a general store in the future.  For this reason she is very grateful to the Manuela Ramos Movement for helping women such as herself to have the chance to develop in their current environment.

loans.use: she will buy various sizes and flavors of soft drinks, mineral water (carbonated and non-carbonated), and juices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies, groceries in larger volumes.

loans.name: Beily

texts.es:
La Sra. Beily pertenece al Banco Comunal “Pachacutec II” del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia y Departamento de San Martín. Está casada, tiene 27 años  y es madre de un niño. 

Ella se  inició como negociante con la venta de plátanos.  Su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00.  Hace tres  años, motivada por una vecina, decide iniciar su negocio de venta de bebidas  gaseosas y agua mineral, poco a poco fue aumentando su clientela a quienes los atiende con la amabilidad que le caracteriza.  Ella cuenta con el apoyo de  sus padres. 

Con este préstamo de S/. 1700.00, comprará cajas y paquetes de bebidas gaseosas de diferentes  marcas, tamaños y sabores para surtir su negocio y continuar dando una mejor atención a sus clientes. 

Beily sueña con tener una cevichería (restaurant - venta de comidas a base de pesacados y mariscos).  Está muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en: Beily is a member of the communal lender “Pachacutec II” of Tarapoto, San Martín, Peru. She is 27, married and has one son. Beily started a business selling plantains, and received a small credit of S/ 300.00.  Three years ago, encouraged by a friend and her parents, she decided to begin selling soft drinks and bottled water.  Her clientele grew steadily as she is very helpful and amiable with her customers.  With this loan of S/ 1700.00, she plans to buy a greater stock of various sizes and flavors of soft drinks to provide a better variety of products for her customers.  Beily dreams one day of opening a restaurant specializing in fish and sea food.  She is grateful to the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for its support and for the opportunities that loans have provided to women such as herself.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks in wholesale quantities

loans.name: David Antonio

texts.es: El señor David labora en una institución en la ciudad de Managua donde a diario se esfuerza para llevar el pan a su mesa y así beneficiar a su amada familia. Se siente muy satisfecho porque ha logrado mantener dicha familia proporcionando las condiciones de vida y supliendo todas y cada una de las necesidades que se presentan en el hogar. El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de materiales de construcción como arema, cemento y otros para reparar la sala que ha estado en malas condiciones y asi proporcionarle un lugar seguro a su familia. Espera que su crédito sea otorgado satisfactoriamente para iniciar con la obra de mejora de construcción.
texts.en: David works in an institution in Managua where he strives daily to bring food to the table for his beloved family. He feels very satisfied that he has been able to provide for his family everything that they need. The loan that he is asking for is to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, and others to repair a room that is in poor condition and thus give his family a more secure living space. He hopes that his loan will be given satisfactorily in order to begin construction.
